name: The Divergent Path
description: How we treat others will reflect on how they view us. Are alien races to be enslaved by our superiority, or can we deal with them as friends? This will allow us to choose the path our civilisation goes down.

name: Adaptive Linguacode Translator
description: Our universal translators have enabled us to communicate better with other alien races; however, there is always room for improvements. By adopting these improved matrices into our translator designs, we can now quickly grasp what our alien friends are saying at a much faster rate.

name: Institute for Slave Labour
description: Assorted societies have no qualms about enslaving members of their own race or others with the growth of interstellar contact. Some do it for martial conquest. Others, for profit.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Army Type: Army | Districts: Admin, Admin Hive | Edict: Share Burden Campaign

name: Open-standard Translation Matrix
description: If we allow the ability to share these upgraded matrixes of our universal translator to our alien friends, it will make contact with these empires more fluent and beneficial for us.

name: Talent Nurturing
description: Propaganda programs and subtle manipulation of economic records ensure talent rises to the top.

name: Diplomatic Corps
description: Allowing other species to have a permanent sovereign-like residences, making them feel like they are on their home planet, will help in the continued cohabitation of our planets with multiple species.

name: Bureau of Cultural Exchange
description: Being able to learn more of the cultural differences and similarities of our alien friends will help to bring us all closer together. Knowledge, after all, is power.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Power Plant 2, Power Plant 3, Power Plant 4

name: Xeno Relations
description: Learning how to deal with alien cultures and traditions is an important part of becoming a galactic power.

name: Code of Hospitality
description: Now that our planets are becoming habitable for multiple species besides our own, it is important that we come up with even more civilised ways for us to co-habitate these lands peacefully.

name: Galactic Forum
description: Providing a meeting place for the galactic powers will promote discussion and diplomacy, and others will look well upon us.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Ranch 2, Grounds 2, Sanctuary 2 | Megastructure: Starbase 1

name: Embassy World
description: A neutral ground where citizens of numerous races are allowed to speak, trade and communicate freely.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Embassy Capital 2 | Decision: Planet Specialisation Configuration

name: Population Management
description: As many races so painfully learnt in previous centuries, populations can expand to exceed the resources that can be provided for them. How can we control this?

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Decisions: Enact Population Control, Expel Population

name: Applied Paranoia
description: We have intercepted concerning transmissions made by our fellow rivals. Perhaps it is not a bad thing to further increase our ability to track what our rivals are planning because if we are not prepared, then all is lost.

name: Orbital Panopticon
description: An orbital prison where every cell can be seen from a central location. The most dangerous criminals are secured here.

name: Ministry of Public Enlightenment
description: By educating our citizens in the cultures of our empire's other inhabitants, they will become closer to each other. This will also help to encourage peoples outside of our empire to possibly relocate to our worlds.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Admin, Admin Hive

name: Secret Military Police
description: Sometimes to get the job done, we need a special branch that is outside the norm of our standard armies. Let us create a new branch within our military that we can use for when these situations arise.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Admin, Admin Hive

name: Counter-Espionage
description: The advance of facial masking, genetic engineering and cloaking devices forces intelligence agencies to adopt new techniques to foil enemy operatives.

name: Sapient Resource Management
description: Utilising sapients as a resource is the most efficient way to deal with the enslavement of an entire race.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Harvesting Gorn 1 | Species Rights: Domestic, Livestock

name: Agony Booth
description: One suggestion to deal with undisciplined sentients is the agony booth, a device capable of stimulating the pain centre of any humanoid. To overcome the limitations of more traditional forms of punishment, in which the nervous system becomes overwhelmed, the booth's sensors can continually shift the stimulation from one nerve cluster to another, keeping the subject in a constant state of agony.

name: Agony Chambers
description: Capable of stimulating the pain center of virtually any humanoid with a synaptic scan calibrating it for each species, the booth's sensors continually shift the stimulation from one nerve cluster to another, keeping the subject in a constant state of agony.

name: Alien Overseers
description: Overseeing the weak feeble carbon based forms of the slaves requires new techniques in order to adequately manage them effectively.

unlock_details.description: Building: Penal Slave Colony 2 | Decision: Planet Specialisation Configuration

name: Labour Camps
description: Labour camps are enclosed areas where slaves can be worked efficiently in a well guarded environment.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Labor Camp 1, Labour Camps

name: Harvesting Centre
description: Harvesting the organs of those unaffected by the Phage allows for a healthy and productive population. The slaves are less than pleased however.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Harvesting Centre 1, Organ Storage Facility

name: Will to Power
description: The will to power describes what many have believe to be the main driving force in a sentient species - achievement, ambition, and the striving to reach the highest possible position in life above all others.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Secret 2 Romulan, Secret 2 Cardassian, Secret 2 Terran | Edict: Will To Power

name: Harvest of the Weak
description: No species matches the superiority of the Undine biology, breaking them down and rebuilding with add to the mastery of the Undine species.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Harvesting Undine 1 | Species Right: Livestock

name: Mercenary Corps
description: Fighting should be left to those who make it their job to do so.

name: Private Military Firms
description: The recruitment of hardened spacers and private citizens to fill the ranks of our vessels can be accomplished if we create the right market conditions.

name: Bounty Hunter Market
description: The recruitment of mercenary crews and bounty hunters to fill the ranks of our vessels can be accomplished if we create the right market conditions.

name: Corner the Market
description: Whether it's by controlling the largest market share, or having a monopoly on certain goods, cornering the market is the goal of every business. Researching the optimum ways to capitalise on our returns is vital.

name: Ferengi Gaming Commission
description: The Ferengi Gaming Commission is a Ferengi government body that oversees gambling in the Ferengi Alliance and in establishments owned by Ferengi outside the Alliance.

name: Advanced Pedagogic Theory
description: Teaching others is a base part of our species, and researching advanced techniques to ensure knowledge is passed efficiently is an important part of our expansion as a civilisation.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: School 1, School 1 Vulcan, School 1 Earth, School 1 Andor, School 1 Betazed, School 1 Bajor, School 1 Orion, School 1 Denobulan, School 1 Rom, School 1 Cardassia, School 1 Banea | Faction Types: Prosperity, Technologist, Ferengi Corporation, Corporation, Vrag | Policy: policy_edu_balanced

name: Mind-Training Leadership Programs
description: Our continued efforts into biological research have enabled us to reinforce important leadership roles into our citizenship.

name: Advanced Scientific Method
description: The advanced scientific method is a body of techniques for investigating phenomena, acquiring new knowledge, or correcting and integrating previous knowledge.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: School 2, School 2 Vulcan, School 2 Earth, School 2 Andor, School 2 Betazed, School 2 Bajor, School 2 Orion, School 2 Denobulan, School 2 Rom, School 2 Cardassia, School 2 Banea | District: Research | Megastructures: Imperial Science Service, Klingon Science Service, Romulan Ministry of Science, Dominion Sciences, Generic Science Station

name: Centre of Anomaly Studies
description: Our vessels continue to encounter dangerous and new spatial anomalies as we expand deeper into space. Creating a centre to focus on these interesting phenomena could provide benefits to us all.

unlock_details.description: Starbase Buildings: Hole Observatory, Hole Observatory Fed, Plume Observatory, Observatory

name: tech_society_interstellar_446
description: Introducing global buildings of education in each of our planets about our interstellar journeys will make further generations even more prepared to face/understand the rigors of space travel and how we can better prepare ourselves for what is truly out there.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: School 3, School 3 Vulcan, School 3 Earth, School 3 Andor, School 3 Betazed, School 3 Bajor, School 3 Orion, School 3 Denobulan, School 3 Rom, School 3 Cardassia, School 3 Banea

name: Zero-G Research Centre
description: Zero-G: the ability to achieve weightlessness. By applying our understanding of gravity, we can create a new module for our starbases that replicates this scientific marvel. In doing so, we are able to further study on chemicals and materials within an environment that could never have been done until now. If perfected, this will lead to sizable increases in the scope of what we can research.

name: Galactic Administration
description: The administrative needs of a star empire are as numerous as they are complex. We will rise to the occasion.

name: University Complex
description: By devoting our academies to specialised areas of research, we can better understand how to increase our output in these particular fields.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: School 4, School 4 Vulcan, School 4 Earth, School 4 Andor, School 4 Betazed, School 4 Bajor, School 4 Orion, School 4 Denobulan, School 4 Rom, School 4 Cardassia, School 4 Banea | District: Research

name: Adaptive Bureaucracy
description: The progress we made calls for a new, nimbler form of administration that may aid, rather than hinder us in our pursuits.

name: Holographic Education
description: With our continued advancements into holographic fields, we can now make new educational outlets available for all our students in our academies by introducing these advanced holographic simulations of what we know or may not know is out there. Doing so will better prepare our future leaders to expect the unexpected that goes with traveling through space.

name: Galactic Sponsorship Programme
description: The strides we have made on the academic front have been incredible. However, we notice some of our best and brightest are yet to be discovered because of the vastness of our empire. By focusing our efforts on a special academy that only accepts the brightest and most courageous of minds, we can now hone these potential citizens into future leaders of our society.

name: Galactic Sponsorship Physics
description: By focusing our efforts on a special physics academy that only accepts the brightest and most courageous of minds, we can now hone these potential citizens into future leaders of our society.

name: Galactic Sponsorship Society
description: By focusing our efforts on a special society academy that only accepts the brightest and most courageous of minds, we can now hone these potential citizens into future leaders of our society.

name: Galactic Sponsorship Engineering
description: By focusing our efforts on a special engineering academy that only accepts the brightest and most courageous of minds, we can now hone these potential citizens into future leaders of our society.

name: Astrometrics Studies
description: With Astrometrics, we can now begin to focus our research into three specialties, physics, biology, and engineering.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Lab Physics 1, Lab Society 1, Lab Engineering 1, Undine Physics 1, Undine Society 1, Undine Engineering 1, Memory Alpha

name: University Planet
description: An entire world dedicated to the storage and research of new theorems, philsophies, techniques, and procedures.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Building: University Capital 2 | Decision: Planet Specialisation Configuration

name: Interstellar Research Initiative
description: Gathering the brightest minds from many races will allow for new ideas and new insights to be found.

name: Memory Alpha
description: The proposal for a central library to hold the total cultural history and scientific knowledge of all planetary members and academic research is one that could bear fruit.

name: Psycho-History
description: The earth-shattering discoveries we have made about the foundational building blocks of life have caused us to perfect the evolution in what we study as a whole. Let us create a building that showcases all we have learnt to increase our society research to unparalleled heights.

name: Exotic Materials Labs
description: Laboratories must be designed with exotic materials in mind, with storage and containment for many of these short-lived and potentially dangerous particles.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Research Lab 1, Undine Research Lab 1

name: Evolutionary Algorithms
description: What if evolution wasn't random? What if it could be guided, as if by machine?

name: Zero Gravity Data Archive
description: The collective wisdom of our society can be stored in these immense data archives, cooled in zero gravity, using lessons of the past to give insights into current research issues.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Research Lab 2, Undine Research Lab 2 | District: Research Node

name: Embodied Dynamism
description: Across history there have always been those who have taken leaps forward. If this dynamism could be embodied into anyone, great strides could be undertaken.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Research Lab 3, Undine Research Lab 3

name: Predictive Tutoring
description: Sometimes through the hard rigors of education, our young need a little guidance. Let us offer special tutoring programs to assist them, so that they may one day be as effective as the best and brightest of our students who graduate.

name: Sentient Human Resource Management
description: The concept of managing individuals as resources within larger systems of production must, by necessity, become more flexible as the potential natures of the managed individuals grow ever more numerous.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Research Lab 4, Undine Research Lab 4

name: Regional Sector Archive
description: Combining all the local data into one large, readily accessible archive, allows research calculators to collaborate and work on projects together, utilising large amounts of Collective data.

name: Central Quadrant Data Archive
description: A massive data archive combining data from all corners of the quadrants together in one spot allows for galaxy-wide collaboration on scientific advancements and projects.

name: Xenobiology
description: Studying the life that arises on other worlds and beyond allows us to understand fundamental aspects of biology that were previously beyond our reach.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Collector Water 1, Heavy Water Facility

name: Genome Mapping
description: Mapping the genome of an individual through the sequencing of their DNA opens up for tailored medical treatments and therapies.

name: Heuristic Evolutionary Models
description: Heuristics is a technique that employs a practical method utilising self-learning protocols via trial and error. By using this approach and creating a large dataset, it has allowed us to foresee many possible defective genes and circumvent them, thereby leading to an increase in quality of life.

name: Memory Engram Interface
description: A memory engram is an impression made physically in neural tissue of the brain by any mental stimulus, thereby explaining the persistence of memory. By researching these further, an interface could be developed to transfer memories into storage.

name: Bio-Molecular Cybernetics
description: Bio-molecular engineering is the application of engineering principles and practices to the purposeful manipulation of molecules of a biological origin. If we apply these practices to our continued advancements within the cybernetics field, then it seems we can create special biogenetic-based cybernetic implants that will increase the lifespan of our species.

name: Radical Longevity Treatments
description: Unidentified minerals brought back to us for study has led us to believe that there are certain properties within these deposits that can increase the lifespan of our people. Now that we know what to look for, we can easily spot them in planets we have or haven't discovered yet.

name: Cell Revitalisation
description: Regimens of periodic cell revitalisation treatments keep the leader class spry and active beyond traditionally expected lifespans.

name: Psionics
description: The mind is in many ways a reflection of the universe itself, a microcosmos. All species may not reach this insight, but their minds are tools greater than any other.

name: Empathic Unity
description: Instilling telepathic or psionic abilities throughout our population can result in a situation where every citizen can feel what everyone else feels. Great anger, rising up in a tsunami, or great calm, peaceful as a calm sea.

name: Transcendence
description: Meditations and research into deeper brain activity has allowed us to unlock the full potential of our minds.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Traits: Telepathy, Psionic Masters

name: Applied Precognition
description: Our computers are becoming so sophisticated that we are now able to predict certain movements or patterns in enemy ships that we attack.

name: Precognition Crime Prevention
description: Combining the minds of those rare individuals with precognition abilities allows us to stop crimes before they occur.

name: Psionic Operatives
description: By utilising the rare members of society who have telepathic or psionic abilities, we can become capable of detecting events before they occur.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Secret 3 Romulan, Secret 3 Cardassian, Secret 3 Terran

name: Stone of Gol
description: The Stone of Gol is an ancient weapon conceived on Vulcan during the turbulent times before the Time of Awakening. It functions as a psionic resonator which focuses and amplifies telepathic energy and then turns them back upon the person experiencing them.

name: Uplift
description: Advanced DNA methylation techniques allow for functionally significant alterations to be made to arbitrary genomes.

name: Genetic Engineering
description: No longer will we be limited by the basic biological structure of our species when striving to improve them. However, doing this can come at a great cost of our own individuality, is it truly worth considering going down this path?

unlock_details.description: Army Type: Army | Decisions: Punishment Disease, End Punishment Disease

name: Deep DNA Resequencing
description: By further advances into understanding our genome mapping of our DNA, we can make even more improved mappings to our gene sequence.

name: Tailored Biological Weapon
description: If we are going to go to war, we must prevail at all costs. Even if it means going down paths that some empires we know may not agree with. Our scientists have come up with a new type of bombardment weapon that can unleash devastating amounts of firepower on a hostile planet that no one has seen before.

name: Retroviral Genome Resequencing
description: By introducing various non-lethal viruses into the genome mapping of our species, we can further increase the growth within our population of our colonized planets.

name: Targeted Gene Expressions
description: Stricter control of RNA and protein production on the cellular level.

name: Perfected Cloning
description: Gene Banks filter and curate available genomes for deployment in clones.

name: Mass-Scale Cloning
description: Automating the cloning process requires new algorithms to handle the data sets from the growing cloned cells before it can be introduced on a mass scale.

name: Selected Lineage
description: Careful reproductive planning should be incentivised, lest we waste valuable genetic legacies.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Army Type: Army | Faction Type: Palkar

name: Capacity Boosters
description: We leave nothing to chance, no matter the cost. Through exacting curation of DNA banks do we build the leaders of tomorrow.

name: The Perfect Soldier
description: We believe we have finally perfected our genome mapping, and now we can apply these advances to create a genetic soldier with unprecedented strength.

name: Morphogenic Field
description: From its cradle as a purely pharmaceutical venture, advancements in our understanding of the morphogenetic field allow for direct, subconscious interfaces with organic units.

name: Xeno Compatibility
description: Some genetic markers are shared between the alien species that exist in the galaxy, more than just common chance would suggest. Investigating these links would allow medical and social gains.

name: Cross-Breeding
description: The strands of DNA between two species may allow for cross-breeding of each race, as long as simple medical procedures are undertaken to ensure both parents' genes bond correctly.

name: Gagarin Genetic Enhancements
description: Our continued studies of genetic engineering bear fruit. We learned that these genetically engineered members carry with them contagious antibodies that attack other people not engineered the same way, at a lethal level. We had to quarantine these enhanced members of our species, but we also learned that these hosts also started to develop telekinetic powers.

name: Xeno-Sociology
description: The advent of new species, created from the cross between two old species, raises new questions on the social and demographic problems facing society.

name: Jem'Hadar
description: The Jem'Hadar are a genetically-engineered species. Having a species that's bred for war can lead to a destructive force that can be feared throughout the galaxy, since after all 'Victory is life'. If we are to have such a destructive force, then it also helps to have a chemical that keeps them in check by making them addicted to it, or lest the species that serves us now becomes our conqueror.

name: Ketracel White Distillation
description: To help ensure the loyalty of our Jem'Hadar soldiers, Ketracel White is required. We have to know where the resources are to produce it. In order to be certain that the White is potent, its ingredients must be highly distilled.

unlock_details.description: Army Types: Jemhadar, Jemhadar Shroud | Buildings: Ketracel White Refinery 1, Link Capital 2, Ketracel Mining Facility

name: Vorta
description: Evolved from marsupials, the Vorta are capable administrators and extremely loyal, if a bit cowardly.

name: Artificial Ketracel White Synthesis
description: The creation of ketracel white without the active ingredients has long been a goal for the Founders. It would require the product to retain its addictive qualities whilst being able to sustain long campaigns.

name: The Great Link Acorn
description: In a time long past, the Scions of the Great Link lead the changelings. Now they lead the Dominion in an effort to make the galaxy's planets more hospitable for them.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action, Custom | Megastructure: Discarded Link

name: Vorta Cloning Complex
description: Operated by Vorta, this simple cloning complex is designed to grow new clones efficiently and with minimal resources.

name: Enriched Yridium Processing
description: The cultivation of enriched yridium could increase ketracel white production, substantially.

name: Planetary Cloning Complex
description: As the Dominion grows larger, a centralised facility across an entire world could be utilised in order to mass produce the required number of Vorta administrators and Jem'Hadar warriors.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Cloning Capital 2 | Decision: Planet Specialisation Configuration

name: Improved Ketracel White Synthesis
description: Our continued studies in understanding this most important substance that is key to our genetically engineered soldier's survivability, will lead us to an even greater ability to mass produce this important isogenic enzyme at a much larger scale.

name: Birth Pools
description: By accelerating the growth cycle of our genetically engineered soldiers in our birthing pools, we can raise a clone from emergence to full maturity in just three days.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Spawning Pool 3 | District: Great Link

name: Stimulant Diet
description: Regimens of periodic cell revitalisation treatments keep the leader class spry and active beyond traditionally expected lifespans.

name: Alpha Jem'Hadar Programme
description: Jem'Hadar who are grown to operate across quadrants are a much sturdier breed than our current stock.

name: Jem'Hadar Fully Automated Cloning Vault
description: A fully automated complex designed to utilise the full might of the Dominion in order to mass produce many clones, usually Jem'Hadar.

name: Jem'Hadar Optimised Cloning Process
description: The rapid growth process of Jem'Hadar no longer provides defective and useless clones thanks to optimisations within the cloning process.

name: Synthetic White Procedures
description: The creation of a new synthetic ketracel substitute without any of the active ingredients is one of the many research paths available.

name: Industrial Farming
description: Vast amounts of industrial equipment can be used to farm food, which can be produced in great abundance with minimal labor needed, so that it becomes available to all very cheaply or even freely.

name: Gene Crops
description: Sophisticated genetic engineering of crops helps increase yield and further improves both taste and nutrient levels.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Produce Requisitorium, Hydroponics Farm 2, Building Hydroponics Farm 2

name: Advanced Hydroponics
description: The challenges inherent in cultivating crops in zero-g are fairly unique, but far from insurmountable.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Farming, Farming Hydroponic, Farming Hunting | Starbase Building: Bay

name: Biodiversity Studies
description: Studying the different forms of life that appear on our world, helps us better understand ourselves and the life that surrounds us

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Hydroponics Farm 3, Building Hydroponics Farm 3, Building Hydroponics Farm 4

name: Xenobotany
description: By learning the bio-genetic properties of edible plants, we can increase our food supplies to an even greater amount.

name: Automated Crop Gathering Drones
description: Large-scale agricultural drones can harvest, reseed and gather crops from across a vast area and bring them back for processing.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Building Hydroponics Farm 4

name: Nano-Vitality Crops
description: Infusing crop strains with small amounts of nano-machines help create a type of produce that is ultra resilient, and the chemical composition of which can be tailored and altered during its entire lifetime.

name: Self-Learning Eco-System
description: Adaptive protocols allow for entire farming facilities to be built which can manage themselves in the event of non-standard weather or climate change.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Hydroponics Farm 4, Building Hydroponics Farm 4, Building Hydroponics Farm 4

name: Transgenic Crop
description: Transgenic crops offer the nutritional elements of several standard food crops in one convenient package.

name: Brunali Hydroponics
description: The unique Brunali biosequencing from their botanists allows for a much higher-yielding hydroponics bay.

name: Stasis Nutrient Storage Techniques
description: Cryogenically storing mass amounts of food allows for long-term storage with no chance of spoilage, though the flavour is impaired somewhat.

name: Advanced Fertilisation Techniques
description: Another study into an unidentified mineral based on our current farming techniques has led us to conclude that this sort of mineral has amazing food properties. By informing our fellow explorers what to look for, we can now discover this resource within our borders and beyond.

name: Xenology
description: Studying the fauna of other worlds gives insight into alien behaviors, allowing us to identify and domesticate docile entities.

unlock_details.description: Building: Xeno Zoo 1 | Zone: Resort Zoo

name: Kelpien Breeding
description: History has taught that delicious species are often hunted to extinction. Biologists have learned from this with regards to the Kelpien though, and instead a breeding programme where the inferior 'Kelpies' are treated as nothing more than cattle has been created, so that we may continue to dine on fine Kelpien long after the species becomes extinct in the wild.

name: Biomass Farm
description: Infusing crop strains with small amounts of nano-machines help create a type of produce that is ultra-resilient, and the chemical composition of which can be tailored and altered during its entire lifetime.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Building Hydroponics Farm 4

name: Orbital Hydroponics
description: The growth of crops and food goods in the absence of soil is a challenging process.

name: Triple-Stage Water Purification
description: Drawing raw water from deep within ice reserves on a world; and cleansing, distilling, and recycling it allows for a source of fresh water.

name: Eco Simulation
description: Simulating the optimal growth conditions of a planet's surface whilst in deep space is one hypothetical way to improve farm yields.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Building Hydroponics Farm 4

name: Large Scale Protein Grow House
description: The creation of an energy-intensive cloning facility for cloned protein could feed millions.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Building Hydroponics Farm 4

name: Living Hull
description: Grown in fluidic space and hardened against the dangers of a non-fluidic universe.

name: Organic Adaptive Hull
description: Pain membranes throughout the living hull can react to damage, allowing areas to be shut off or cut off from the whole.

name: Bio-Adaptive Hull
description: The memory of the hull shape allows for a living hull to repair itself slowly, forming itself into a perfect memory of itself.

name: Self-Arranging Compounds
description: Shifting and ever flowing, the self-arranging compounds can be used to improve the hardiness of the outer skin of the bioships.

name: Organic Learning Material
description: Life lives within the hull of the bioships, and it can now learn and adapt to dangers it may face.

name: Self-Aware Ship Material
description: As the bioships live longer, the hull becomes more aware, and more susceptible to shaping to our needs.

name: Vacuum-Grade Tissue
description: The harmful radiation and rays of energy weaponry require a thicker, more viscous outer skin to act as armour against the dangers of this realm.

name: Chitin Hull
description: A hardened carapace forms over the living hull of the bioship, providing added protection against dangers.

name: Self-Polarizing Hull
description: The energy of the living hull can now react to weapons fire and adjust its polarity and internal frequencies by itself.

name: Organic Buckyball Hull
description: Lining the hull with a self-repairing buckyball sheet structure will provide improved protection against energy weaponry.

name: Organic Diamond Hull
description: An organic lattice can form within the skin of the vessel, providing a hardened honeycomb-like structure that is harder than the hardest rocks found upon these non-fluidic worlds.

name: Tal Shiar
description: The Tal Shiar is the elite intelligence agency of the Romulan Star Empire. Its purpose is guarding the security of the Empire, both from the Romulans' interstellar enemies as well as from traitors within the Romulan population itself.

name: Reman Indoctrination
description: Indoctrinated within the dark mines of Remus, the Remans know their lot in life.

name: Telepathic Remote Control
description: Utilising the latent psionic powers of certain races and species, telepathic remote control can be accomplished over vast distances with no regard to technological limits.

name: Galactic Research Centre
description: Collaboration between different worlds can be difficult, but the construction of a purpose build research centre of enormous proportions would enable the greatest minds from many worlds to come together and research in harmony.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Galactic Institute 1, Galactic Institute Rom, Galactic Institute Car, Galactic Institute Baj, Galactic Institute Tri, Galactic Institute Earth, Galactic Institute Vot, Galactic Institute Vul

name: New Frontiers
description: Extending a limb to those who are the most alien to our way of life can open the way to new frontiers.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Embassy Capital 2, Embassy Capital 3, Embassy Capital 4, Embassy Capital 5

name: Entropic Recursion
description: With the increases in technology, more and more experiments must be conducted in special conditions such as zero gravity. The creation of an orbital platform devoted entirely to research could provide a substantial research boost to our empire.

name: Slave Resource Optimisation
description: How we treat others will reflect on how they view us. Alien races that are enslaved by our superiority are at our mercy. This will allow us to choose the living standards for many of our slaves.

name: Everlasting Control
description: A slave that is born and dies a slave knows nothing of what lies beyond the walls.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Penal Slave Colony 2, Penal Slave Colony 3, Penal Slave Colony 4, Penal Slave Colony 5

name: The Breadbasket
description: Some worlds are just ideal for the production of food, with ideal temperate bands across much of the surface. One of these worlds could export enough food to feed billions.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Hydroponics Farm 1, Building Hydroponics Farm 1, Building Hydroponics Farm 1 | Zone: Habitat Hydroponics

name: The Secret History of the D'Arsay
description: After years of research, the D'Arsay Archive has revealed to us the secrets of its progenitor society.

name: Nanite Fabrication
description: Large-scale nanite fabrication ensures that the Collective has all the resources it requires.

name: Nanite Transformation
description: The transformation of nanites allows for the programming within each nanite to be interchangeable, from a nanite that flows through a drone, to a nanite that flows through the waste nutrient tubes.

unlock_details.description: Building: Machine Fabrication 3 | Ship Type: Colonizer

name: The Word of Alar
description: Alar was a famous philosopher from Skorr. When alive, he led his people into space and brought a new era of peace. Before his death, his brain patterns were recorded and preserved in an indurite sculpture and is referred to as the 'Soul of Skorr'. By analysing the recording of this sculpture, we feel it could be the key to understanding how to reach new heights in developing our own colonies.

name: Federalisation
description: Managing a nation spread over several planets brings new challenges that call for an entirely new set of governmental paradigms. Our political experts have a proposition for a new form of government that will clarify the powers and responsibilities of our local and regional administrators while maintaining the central authority of our homeworld.

name: Universal Currency
description:
It is time for our economy to expand throughout the rest of the galaxy. To facilitate galactic trade opportunities, we must develop a universal form of currency between many different empires. Remember Ferengi Rule of Acquisition 
 tech_society_biology_1025:0

unlock_details.description: Building: Starport 1 | Decisions: Starport Energy, Starport Tallonian Machine

name: Digital Commerce
description: Digital commerce is the buying and selling of goods and services using networks and commerce infrastructure.

name: Planetary Economic Forum
description: The creation of a political body that can have the authority to pass large policies affecting the entire world.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Policys: food_policy_rationing, economic_policy_civilian, trade_policy_default

name: Interplanetary Commerce
description: The transactions and guidelines affecting commerce between two or more planetary bodies.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Bank 2, Bank 2 Logistics, Starport 2 | Starbase Building: Trading Company

name: Private Contractors
description: Outsourcing key areas of starbases to the private sector can result in substantial savings and improved efficiency amongst those outsourced divisions.

name: Long-Range Cargo Freighters
description: Warp capable cargo freighters carrying vast amounts of goods between worlds provide the life blood of the economy.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Power Plant 2, Power Plant 3, Power Plant 4

name: tech_society_biology_1025
description: Brainstorming in our public sector has come up with an extremely powerful idea. Research will allow the construction of a galaxy-spanning hotel chain that can cater for different species requirements and desires. Research will be required into different environments, traditions, and spiritual needs of numerous races.

name: Interstellar Trade Association
description:
Ferengi Rule of Acquisition 
 tech_society_interstellar_446:0

name: Galactic Market Economics
description: Being able to trade goods freely from numerous worlds sounds easy on paper - until you understand that each good has specific markets and tariffs that must be arranged. Finding an amicable solution will allow our traders to prosper substantially.

name: The Emporium
description: Citizens travel from all over to visit the Emporium, where the most unique and sought after luxuries are bought and sold.

name: Intelligent Algo-Traders
description: Capable of crashing a primitive civilisations stock market within an hour, these algo-traders estimate demand and create buying and selling orders rapidly across the banking network.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Power Plant 4, Starport 4

name: Communal Urban Planning
description: Urban planning is a technical and political process concerned with the development and design of land use and the built environment, including air, water, and the infrastructure passing into and out of urban areas, such as transportation, communications, and distribution networks.

name: Jevonite Jewellery
description: The discovery of a small amount of Jevonite, a rare mineral stone said to be breathtaking in appearance by many species, has led to the need to discover more deposits.

name: Interstellar Tourism Association
description: The outstanding natural beauty of many planets is a massive draw for visitors from all over the galaxy. Creating resorts at these places could prove to be lucrative, and improve the well being of our own citizens.

name: Galactic Merchant Association
description: Our economy is thriving, but there are ways to make it prosper even more. Let us further those gains by investing into a building that can only help grow our prosperity by allowing an influx of new goods to trade with other empires and our colonies within our borders.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Commercial Capital 3 | Decision: Planet Specialisation Configuration

name: Guild of Entertainment Directors
description: We may have reached the stars, but the majority of our population still yearns to visit other worlds to see the wonders of the galaxy. Investing in a way to popularise these natural attractions across the galaxy could ensure our society continues to prosper.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Resort Capital 2 | Decision: Planet Specialisation Configuration

name: Risan Hospitality Practices
description: The Risan practices combine spiritual, physical and mental techniques to ensure jamaharon is reached.

name: Galactic Cuisine
description: 'You have to try this Bajoran Jumja Stick, it is amazing,' says one person talking to another. 'Hmm, no thanks, maybe I'll have the Larish Pie instead...' If we want to attract even more aliens to our colonies or home planet, it doesn't hurt to include the famous cuisines of other races we have encountered, but careful with that Romulan Ale, as you know, it is illegal, at least for some empires.

name: Galactic Stock Exchange
description: The marvels of expanding our relations throughout the galaxy has led to further advances in interstellar trading throughout our empire.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Galactic Exchange, Galactic Exchange Ferengi

name: Zhat Vash
description: The Zhat Vash are an ancient and secret Romulan cabal of Tal Shiar operatives whose sole purpose is to prevent Synthetic life from destroying the galaxy.

name: Basic Espionage
description: Espionage, otherwise known as the practice of spying or of using spies, typically by governments to obtain political and military information.

name: Starfleet Intelligence
description: Starfleet Intelligence was a branch of Starfleet responsible for gathering and analyzing information concerning neighboring powers in the galaxy, and for carrying out covert investigations regarding possible threats to Earth and, later, the Federation.

name: Confederacy Intelligence Agency
description: Confederation Intelligence was a branch of the Confed Corps responsible for gathering and analyzing information concerning neighboring powers in the galaxy, and for carrying out covert investigations regarding possible threats to humanity.

name: Section 31 Agency
description: Section 31 was an organization which claimed to protect the security interests of United Earth and, later, the United Federation of Planets. The organization claimed to be sanctioned by the original Starfleet Charter, Article 14, Section 31 of which allowed for extraordinary measures to be taken in times of extreme threat

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Secret 2 Starfleet, Secret S31 Starfleet | Job: Enforcer | Policy: ufp_espionage_0

name: Dominion Intelligence Agency
description: Dominion Intelligence was the branch responsible for information gathering within the Dominion.

name: Mass Scale Modular Habitation Dome
description: Reinforced interlocks and modular design allow for large prefabricated structures to simply be added to existing structures.

name: Vitality Boosters
description: Genetic enhancements can be used to boost the vitality and potency of an individual.

name: Bioform Sculpting
description: We have made amazing strides in studying the multitudes of life. Now that these foundational building blocks of life have been discovered, let us further advance our knowledge of this by discovering the true meaning of it.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Lab Society 1, Memory Alpha, Monitor Station

name: Paths of Industry
description: The ability to focus an entire world into one industry is one that is now possible.

name: Global Production Strategy
description: Linked energy and industrial production facilities across an entire world could produce enough excess industrial capacity to build and power a fleet of starships.

name: Transgenic Crops
description: Transgenic crops offer the nutritional elements of several standard food crops in one convenient package.
