description: %C/O%

name: Cloaking Offensive Tactics
description: Just like how a predatory creature uses stealth to ambush its prey, our ships can move faster and cause more damage when using the cloak as a weapon.

name: MACO Detachment
description: Military Assault Command Operations (MACO) was a United Earth organization that existed as a part of the United Earth Military, their integration into Starfleet vessels provided greater levels of protection and mission opportunities.

name: Reman Shock Troops
description: The Reman's serve little purpose in our military, but their impressive strength and fearsome nature make them excellent shock troops.

name: Galactic Archivism
description: The history of our galaxy warrants proper preservation in order to learn from those who came before us. An archive on the grandest scale would fit such a purpose.

unlock_details.description: Megastructure: Federation HQ and Archive | Tradition: Archivism Adopt

name: Cordrazine
description: Cordrazine is an experimental strong chemical stimulant useful for emergency medical treatment. The drug is in the form of a red liquid and can be injected with a hypospray.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Buildings: Pharma Factory 1, Cordrazine Mining Facility

name: Frontier Medicine
description: The colonisation of alien worlds has opened up an entirely new field of biomedical research.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Frontier Clinic 2, Frontier Clinic 2 Earth, Frontier Clinic 2 Acamar, Frontier Clinic 2 Bajor, Frontier Clinic 2 Vulcan | Edict: Healthcare Campaign | Starbase Building: Hospital

name: Medical Nano-bots
description: Nano-scale bots that can repair damaged tissue allows for life saving surgeries which would otherwise have been fatal.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Jobs: Gene, Gene Drone, Vidiian Honatta

name: Interstellar Health Organisation
description: As a colony grows, so does its medical needs. Larger colonies are potentially exposed to more dangerous pathogens on alien worlds.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Frontier Clinic 3, Frontier Clinic 3 Earth, Frontier Clinic 3 Acamar, Frontier Clinic 3 Bajor, Frontier Clinic 3 Vulcan

name: Anesthezine
description: The creation of pain medications that can be quickly and safely administered to numerous races is an important medical breakthrough.

name: Secrets of Life
description: Having the opportunity to study the multitudes of life lets us find some common ground for all living beings. The foundational building blocks of life.

name: Improvoline
description: The creation of advanced safe sedatives allows for more dangerous procedures to be safely undergone.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Jobs: Gene, Gene Drone, Vidiian Honatta

name: Bio-Mimetic Gel
description: Bio-mimetic gel is a liquid substance used in the study of genetics that is often highly regulated. Its applications include the creation of biogenic weapons and organic explosives, as well as illegal genetic and cloning experiments.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Building Hydroponics Farm 4

name: Long-Term Medical Holographic Program
description: While flesh and blood doctors may be preferred over their holographic counterparts by patients, the usefulness of long-term holographic doctors is hard to disagree with. The holograms may lack a certain 'bedside manner', but they are able to act as general knowledge doctors, specialists, and even sometimes as nurses, all at the same time.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Frontier Clinic 4, Frontier Clinic 4 Earth, Frontier Clinic 4 Acamar, Frontier Clinic 4 Bajor, Frontier Clinic 4 Vulcan | Tradition: Holographic 5

name: Drone Reprogramming Regime
description: Research into the reprogramming of the nanites inside assimilated drones allows us to to slowly return these Borg to the correct ethos.

name: Necrotic Tissue Revitalisation
description: The process of the revitalisation of necrotic tissue and adjustment to the DNA to create new members of the Kobali race is a unique medical technology.

name: Planetary Restoration
description: The transformation of a world by the Borg into an assimilated nightmare requires new techniques to cleanse the atmosphere and restart the life cycle upon the world.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Decision: Planet Specialisation Configuration

name: Therapeutic Regime Algorithm
description: Therapy has often been ignored by science, until recently when biology has recently discovered that stress is a vital part of the growing process. Too little or too much and performance is degraded sharply.

name: Spirit of the Hunt
description: The primal urge to hunt is deep within each of us. Dedicating a world to be a hunting ground would bring glory to our hunters.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Wilderness Capital 2, Hirogen Worthy Prey Reserve | Decisions: Establish Hunting Colony, Planet Specialisation Configuration

name: Preservation Protocols
description: Scientific protocols will ensure the preservation of ecosystems with no over hunting, and biological harmony amongst predators and prey.

name: Bureau of Colonial Affairs
description: Colonies all have different needs at differing levels of development. Researching the colonisation process allows for any bottlenecks in colonisation to be fixed and the process to be smoothed out.

name: New World Horizons
description: Calculating required resources and gear required to establish a planetary colony allows us to herd brave pioneers into grand 'colony ships', confident that they will survive the long voyage across the stars to their new home.

name: Stasis Pods
description: We have found worlds that can be extremely habitable for settling, but are very far away from our home planet and dangerous to our colonists if they touch down and settle right away. By suspending all cellular activity, we can now develop our distant colonies at a much faster rate while our colonist remain in stasis whilst the most dangerous hazards are cleared away.

name: Mastery of Nature
description: Our mastery of the natural world allows our colonies to work in harmony with nature across numerous worlds, allowing the removal of dangerous areas.

name: Bio-sculpting Nanites
description: Our advances in nanite technology allow us to introduce programmed nanites on a foreign world which can break down harmful pathogens and obstacles on the planet in preparation for colonisation.

name: Advanced Urban Planning
description: As we continue to grow our colonies we are starting to develop more efficient ways to clear the hazardous areas that once was not suitable for habitation.

name: Assembly Algorithms
description: The application of game and puzzle theory has the potential to greatly optimize modular assembly and construction.

name: Gravitational Analysis
description: Increasingly powerful computation paradigms allow us to adapt individual construction projects to planetary and ultra-local gravitational conditions.

name: The Mars Initiative
description: Mars, a planet that's been slowly made habitable due to our advances in creating natural habitat domes for our people to live in. However, with our increased understanding on how comets work there could be a way to divert them to the Mars polar ice caps. It may be worth investigating this to see if we can truly change the atmosphere on Mars itself for the better.

unlock_details.description: Building: Verteron Array | Decisions: Mars Terraform Funding, Mars Development Funding, Mars Utopia Backup, Weytahn Terraform Funding 1, Weytahn Development Funding

name: New Atlantis Project
description: The creation of a new subcontinent by creating land out of the Mid-Atlantic Ridge could provide a whole new living space on Earth.

name: Pioneering Initiative
description: Pioneering incentives such as land, titles, mineral rights or absolution from crimes allows the amount of manpower dedicated to new worlds to be increased magnificently. Our peoples are excited about our new worlds.

name: Pioneering Spirit
description: Several members of our private sector have decided to commercialize colonisation. While this does reduce the mineral cost for establishing new colonies, the colonists that these businesses recruit may have different cultural and political philosophies from the rest of our citizens.

name: M-Class Colonization
description: Colonization of worlds with an oxygen-nitrogen base requires very little in the way of terraforming.

name: Barystatic Atmospheric Filter
description: To remove pollutants from the atmosphere of our worlds we have theorised a barystatic atmospheric filter. Functioning by projecting negatively-charged ions into the stratosphere, which then transfer their charge to atmospheric pollutants, the thus-charged pollutants are then collected by the positively-charged intake vents of the barystatic filter.

name: Breen All-Weather Thermal Suit
description: To combat the searing temperatures found often on other worlds across the galaxy, our Vel'sh scientists and engineers are putting together a suit that will allow our peoples to inhabit many worlds.

name: Terraforming
description: There are many planets out there that could be habitable if we are able to somehow modify the planet to suit our livable needs.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Ascension Perk: World Shaper | Decisions: Bleak Planet, Hazardous Weather, Dangerous Wildlife

name: Foreign Soil Enrichment
description: Orbiting vessels can bombard the surface of new worlds with speciality microbes to enrich foreign soils, enabling new colonies to get off to a much better start.

name: Atmospheric Reclamation
description: Humidity regulators and chemical dispersal units are the first step towards a fundamentally altered atmosphere.

name: Weather Control System
description: Orbital systems of mirrors and shades can affect dramatic changes in planetary climates, when managed properly.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Building Hydroponics Farm 4

name: Harmonious Ecological Adaptation
description: While expanding our reach to strange new worlds, we have colonized several planets which are near unlivable for our peoples. Now we can modify the atmospheres of these planets to make them more habitable, so our citizens can thrive.

name: Global Environment Colony Kit
description: In order to standardise our terraforming efforts, a terraforming device containing all the necessary seeds, fertilizer, power generators, and replicators that a planet needs has been designed, known as the G.E.C.K. for short.

name: Extreme Colonisation Techniques
description: As we continue to advance our terraforming techniques, we can now come up with even greater methods to terraform the most hazardous areas of a planet.

name: Glacier Sculpting
description: The Breen are one of the few races that prefer the coldness of Class P planets even more so than Andorians. By introducing new terraforming techniques it is possible we can change the atmosphere of different planets, that have already been designated to be of a different class than P to now be more suitable to our needs instead.

name: Hostile Planet Colonisation
description: The temperatures of Tholia are ideal for the crystalline bodies of the Tholian, one that can only be matched by Demon class planets.

name: Shatter-Resistant Coating
description: Damaged crystalline bodies can be partially repaired by the application of a shatter-resistant coating.

name: Tholian All-Planet Armoured Exo-Suits
description: In order to purify worlds outside the regular temperature range of our Y class planets, our people require armoured exosuits that can enable us to bring the purity of our world to them.

name: Modular Habitation Dome
description: Reinforced interlocks and modular design allow for prefabricated structures to simply be added to existing structures.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Domed City, Underground City

name: Mass-scale Asteroid Bombardment
description: Bombarding a world with asteroids allows water to form in the atmosphere of certain worlds, transforming the climate.

name: Advanced Magma Sculpting
description: By bombarding the atmosphere with thermionic radiation, we can eventually bring worlds to more closely match the pure temperatures of Tholia.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Ascension Perk: World Shaper

name: Demon Planet Colonisation
description: The conditions on demon class planets are so far outside the extremes of humanoid carbon-based life that only crystalline or R3 type lifeforms can inhabit them.

name: Magma Sculpting
description: Unlike most species, Tholians require a specific kind of atmosphere to survive long-term. So, if we wish to expand beyond our initial borders, then we must come up with terraforming practices that makes the planets we colonize suitable for us.

name: Quasicrystal Preservation Techniques
description: The prevention of shattering and degradation amongst the crystalline form of the Tholian can be accomplished by harmonic emitters that strengthen weakened crystal forms.

name: Large Scale Modular Habitation Dome
description: Reinforced interlocks and modular design allow for large prefabricated structures to simply be added to existing structures.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Domed City, Underground City

name: Perfected Magma Sculpting
description: By bombarding the atmosphere with thermionic radiation, we can eventually bring worlds to more closely match the pure temperatures of Class Y magma worlds.

name: Self Healing Crystals
description: Stimulating the crystalline regrowth within a Tholian requires unique resonance frequencies, which when activated can provide a substantial boost to wellness.

name: Quasicrystal Formation Study
description: Deep studies of our crystalline nature, as well as naturally forming crystal structures, has led us to the belief that we can adjust our harmonic resonance within our own growing crystalline bodies, resulting in potential enhancements to our crystalline base.

name: Twinned Tholian Pairing
description: The resonance within the lattice allows two Tholians to share the same bond, and treatment of one heals the other.

name: Silicon-Crystal Lattice Treatment
description: The natural silicoid bodies of the Sheliak are tough to damage but also relatively slow to heal. Special regrowth techniques have been developed to heal and cure damaged Sheliak.

name: Hyperonic Chamber
description: Our terraforming methods have allowed us to make great engineering strides on a specific type of building, that makes the hostile planets we conquer or colonize feel like the eternal deserts we know all too well back home.

name: Silicon-Based Ecological Study
description: Deep studies of our silicon nature as well as naturally forming silicon structures has led us to the belief that we can adjust our harmonic resonance within our own growing silicon bodies, resulting in potential enhancements to our silicon base.

name: Silicon Polymorphs
description: Large pulses of hyperonic radiation against the Sheliak silicoid form allows for serious wounds and damages to be healed rapidly by allowing the regrowth of the silicoid structures.

name: Sheliak Polymorphism
description: Acoustic emitters are now utilised in the regrowth process of the Sheliak body, which can now heal more rapidly from disease or wounds. Advanced radiation chambers with acute vibrational emitters also create a suitable atmosphere for optimal regeneration.

name: Massive Glacier Removal
description: Flash-vaporisation engines quickly and efficiently erase glacial ice, at the expense of some increased heat and atmospheric humidity in the local area.

name: Toxic Kelp Removal
description: Specialised drones can mechanically clear vast swaths of toxic kelp with minimal use of biocides.

name: Dense Jungle Removal
description: Flash deforestation is, in and of itself, nothing revolutionary. Accomplishing it in a tightly controlled area on a strict schedule, however, is.

name: Quicksand Basin Removal
description: Introducing hydrogels engineered for stabilisation allows for near-instantaneous solidification of quicksand basins.

name: Deep Sinkhole Removal
description: Specialised aerosol construction stabilisers can be used to quickly and cleanly seal existing sinkholes as well as stabilise any subterranean hollows that may give rise to them.

name: Noxious Swamp Removal
description: Focused drainage and detox efforts allow for the complete eradication of swampland.

name: Dangerous Wildlife Removal
description: Tactical disruption of natural habitats combined with converging search-and-destroy patterns can effectively eliminate hostile wildlife in a very short span of time.

name: Mountain Range Removal
description: Sometimes there is very little difference between terraformation and demolition.

name: Volcano Removal
description: Tectonic stabilisation techniques allow for the pacification of active volcanoes.

name: Hyperonic Radiation Generator
description: By generating hyperonic radiation and emitting it into the atmosphere of our worlds, we can further increase their habitability.

name: Demon World Sculpting
description: The Corporate requires more resources be invested in terraforming worlds to be more suitable for habitation. The initial sunk cost will be recouped over time.

name: Desert Sculpting
description: The Sheliak are one of the few races that are able to settle on Class H planets as they prefer an environment that is the same temperature as their bodies. By introducing new terraforming techniques it is possible we can change the atmosphere of different planets that have already been designated to be of a different class than H to now be more suitable to our needs instead.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Ascension Perk: World Shaper

name: Advanced Desert Sculpting
description: By introducing new terraforming techniques, it is possible we can change the climate of different planets that have already been designated to be of a different class than H to now be more suitable to our needs instead.

name: Bio-World Colonisation
description: Bio-worlds are neither planets nor living organisms, but a mysterious mix of the two. Found in Fluidic Space these strange worlds harbour never seen before lifeforms and home to the Undine.

name: Hive Cluster
description: Hive clusters are distributed computing environments used to process next generation sequencing and other biological data.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Police Hive 1, Alpha Hub 1, Building Queen 1, Building Undine 1, Undine Police Hive 1

name: Mass-scale Exotic Matter Synthesisation
description: Complex and exotic materials which are otherwise found rarely within the natural world require difficult synthesis to create in the laboratory. Mass-scale synthesis of these should be possible if the correct research is undertaken.

name: Multithreaded Processing Algorithms
description: To execute multiple processes or threads concurrently, new algorithms should be developed to ensure seamless calculations.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Police Hive 2, Undine Police Hive 2, Building Hydroponics Farm 2 | Decision: Enact Population Control Gestalt

name: Hive Confluence
description: The flow of information between the central processing units and each autonomous unit can potentially be improved so that packets of data which return to the processor are checked for corruption before being reuploaded to the unit.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Alpha Hub 2, Building Queen 2, Building Undine 2 | District: Admin Undine

name: Hive Production Focus
description: Subroutines which allow for the setting of key policies within the hive.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | District: Admin Hive | Edict: Fortress Proclamation Machine

name: Unity of Purpose
description: A singular directive can be programmed into each unit so that it complies but has the flexibility to adapt their own behaiviour to best suit the goal of achieving the objective.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Alpha Hub 3, Building Queen 3, Building Undine 3

name: Aberrant Behaviour Protocols
description: Detecting rogue commands within a populace is just the first step in the protocols design to decrease aberrant behaviour.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Police Hive 3, Undine Police Hive 3, Building Hydroponics Farm 3

name: Slaved Drone Hives
description: Slaving one hive onto another allows for substantial redundancy and backup processing availability.

name: Advanced Self Learning Loops
description: Iterative self-learning loops can improve upon each other to ensure maximised social progress.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Generator, Generator Underground, Energy Node

name: Deviancy Elimination Algorithm
description: Upon processing information received from any of the countless of units, the processing nodes can adjust and check for any deviant or corrupt code, correcting it and applying fixes whilst sending the information back.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Police Hive 4, Undine Police Hive 4

name: Collective Production Methods
description: The production methods where waste is eliminated and every member of the collective works together to achieve that objective is the ideal goal of our latest research proposal.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Alpha Hub 4, Building Queen 4, Building Undine 4

name: Chromodynamic Power Battery
description: The creation of power supplies that provide life to Automated Personnel Units was once restricted to the Creators, before they were Protected.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Robot Assembly Plant 1, Cpm Factory 1, Apu Mustering 1

name: APU Hive Node
description: The combined processing power of many APUs can be maximised in a hive node.

name: Faster APU Assembly Techniques
description: Mass production and just in time deliveries ensure a more rapid production of APUs.

name: Militarised Swarm Tactics
description: Advances to the transwarp communications allows the construction of an array that can send signals across the entire galaxy, increasing our influence.

name: Deviancy Reduction Algorithm
description: Feedback algorithms allow information that is passed to the main harmonisation computers to be checked for deviancy.

name: Improved APU Assembly Automation
description: The creation of new automation techniques will allow for massive assembly plant where rapid assembly of Automated Personnel Units will be undertaken, the only limitations being the supply of raw materials.

name: Biomechanics
description: Understanding and engineering the biological functions of living beings.

name: Fully Automated APU Assembly
description: Linked raw materials, manufacturing and assembly lines dedicated to the creation of new Automated Personnel Units will allow for a fully automated APU assembly line.

name: Robotic Paradise
description: Maximum efficiency in the pursuit of the overall directive results in entire worlds being dedicated to a singular purpose.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Ascension Perk: World Shaper

name: Regenerative Chromodynamic Cells
description: The power within chromodynamic cells can now be regenerated rapidly, allowing those cells that were previously used for replacement to be used for new units.

name: Chromodynamic Power Cell
description: Larger and more powerful power cells can now be created based on iterative redesign of the Protected Creators work.

name: Self-Regenerating Modules
description: The power within chromodynamic power modules themselves can now be regenerated by each individual unit, bypassing one of the last issues of the Creators.

name: Modular Design Concepts
description: By introducing a streamlined concept into the way our ships are being designed, we can reduce the cost it takes to maintain these types of ships.

name: Chromodynamic Power Micro-Cell
description: The reduction in size of the CPM units allows for improved production and more simple installation within new units.

name: Fourth-Generation CPM Core
description: Further advances to the Chromodynamic Power Modules has led to the prototype for the fourth generation core, which contains longer lasting battery life and power output.

name: Metallic Metropolis
description: The full-scale production of CPMs allows our population to expand well into the billions of units.

name: Queen Chamber
description: Creation of a new protocol for a Borg Queen will allow this high functioning Borg to focus the drones and bring order to chaos.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Building Nursery 1, Nanite Factory 1, Borg Mustering 1, Borg Capital 2, Borg Assimilation 1

name: The Living Hive
description: The Collective is a hive of beings that require direction. By researching new methods of optimal leadership, the Collective can recruit new leaders.

name: Genome Purification & Optimisation
description: Purifying genetic weakness from the genome of assimilated species by combining our assimilated knowledge can provide stronger healthier drones. Why do species resist this perfection? We only wish to raise quality of life, for all species.

name: Transwarp Communication
description: Transwarp Communications allow rapid communication and data transmission between far flung colonies and species, increasing the rate in which we can expand across new worlds.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Nanite Factory 1, Nanite Factory 2, Nanite Factory 3, Nanite Factory 4, Borg Mustering 3

name: Atmospheric Nanite Dispersal
description: The dispersal of airborne nanites into the atmosphere of a planet or ship would be an optimal method of assimilating large areas without the need for a full nanite injection. Research is required into the self-replication abilities and survivability of the nanites in a hostile environment.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action, Custom | District: Farming Nanites

name: Second-Generation Nanites
description: Miniaturisation of the nanites allows for less resources to be consumed during manufacture.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Nanite Factory 2, Nanite Factory 3, Nanite Factory 4

name: Third-Generation Nanites
description: Organic logic gates and limited self-repair functions should result in potent and powerful nanites that are capable of travelling vast distances before succumbing to failure.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Nanite Factory 3, Nanite Factory 4

name: Empress of All Space
description: A Queen allows for situational improvements in the allocation of drones. Improvements to the Queen protocol will further increase the Collective's goals.

name: Fourth-Generation Nanites
description: Further iterative improvements to the nanite production facilities should enable an almost seamless supply of nanites with very little waste.

name: Rapid-Dispersal Nanite Carpet Bombing
description: Atmospheric dispersion showed that assimilation could easily take place over a large scale; however, many imperfect beings we have encountered tend to centralise their populations in large areas known as 'cities'. A rapid nanite dispersal carpeting the entirety of these population structures would increase the rate of assimilation.

name: Advances in Nanite Development
description: The infinite regression towards the smallest known particle continues, providing advances in nanotechnology and nanite production.

name: Genome Optimisation techniques
description: Outfitting maturation chambers with biological substations allows for genetic modification of genomes that can match the exact requirements of the Collective.

name: Self-replicating Nanites
description: Research can be taken into self-replicating nanites that utilise outside sources in order to reproduce themselves indefinitely.

name: Accelerated Growth
description: By ensuring perfect conditions and enhanced chemicals, we can accelerate the growth of the young drones.

name: Protector of the Uni-Realm
description: A Queen allows for situational improvements in the allocation of drones. Improvements to the Queen protocol will further increase the Collective's goals.

name: Industrial Unicomplex Expansion
description: Research into a vast industrial manufacturing hub connecting throughout the unicomplex would allow for the Collective to grow larger.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Decision: Expand Borg Unicomplex 1 | Starbase Building: Matter Converter | Starbase Module: Reactor

name: Highly-Efficient Nanite Assembly Chain
description: Organic logic gates and limited self-repair functions should result in potent and powerful nanites that are capable of travelling vast distances before succumbing to failure.

name: Power-Generation Unicomplex Expansion
description: Generating power and distributing across the unicomplex is a process that takes many resources. By researching more efficient ways to do this, the Collective can grow larger.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Decision: Expand Borg Unicomplex 2

name: Neuro-Processing Adjunct
description: Improvements to the neuro-processing in secondary adjuncts allows for improved vessel command and control.

name: Primary Matrix Adjunct Autonomy Protocols
description: Primary Matrix adjuncts can now assist with the command and control of vessels across the galaxy, further improving naval capacity.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Decision: Expand Borg Unicomplex 3 | Job: Drone Undine

name: Trimatrix Adjunct Autonomy Protocols
description: Improvements to the neuro-processing in tertiary adjuncts allows for improved vessel command and control.

name: Drone Allocation and Redistribution
description: Improvements to logistical requirements and transport arrangements allows for a more rapid reallocation of drones to areas where they are required.

name: A Perfect Unity: The Limbs of the Queen
description: The Queen is one step on the way to perfection; however, every drone is but an extension of her body. Individual drones learning from their experience could improve the Collective in itself.

name: A Perfect Unity: The Eyes of the Queen
description: The Queen is one step on the way to perfection. She must be provided the best equipment in order to achieve her singular tasks.

name: A Perfect Unity: Hands of the Queen
description: As perfection grows near, our Queen can invoke her will upon the armadas of ships, ensuring less wastage of resources and more efficient use of the vessels.

name: A Perfect Unity: Body of the Queen
description: As perfection grows near, our Queen can invoke her will upon the infrastructure of the Collective, ensuring a more optimal usage of resource, reducing the burden of maintenance.

name: The Breach
description: The initial breach from the safe life giving fluids into this dark vast coldness filled with metal.

name: The Reef
description: Long gone is the reef from which we depend upon, instead there is only small gravity bound reefs surrounding burning balls of gaseous material.

name: Hatchery Pods
description: Hatching new life within this universe requires some evolutionary adjustments.

name: Planetary Reef
description: The planetary reefs upon which we now rely are filled with challenge and torment.

name: Solar Reef
description: The anchored burning balls of gas that these gravity dwellers survive upon provide a wealth of materials that can be used to further our cause.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Building Hydroponics Farm 2, Building Hydroponics Farm 3 | District: Farming Undine

name: Stellar Reef
description: Gathered together, we can see the vast reef that makes up this area, that the inhabitants call a 'galaxy' and which we seek to cleanse.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Building Nursery 2, Building Hydroponics Farm 2, Building Hydroponics Farm 3

name: Hatching Chamber
description: Self contained within a fluidic embrace, these hatching chambers provide solace against the cold dark universe.

name: Dimensional Reef
description: Shifting between fluidic space and this darkened dimension requires substantial biomass.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Building Hydroponics Farm 3

name: Hatching Complex
description: An entire complex bound within the gravity well of this planetary reef can be dedicated to fluidic growth.

name: Advances in Biomass Production
description: Learning the techniques to let biomass grow within this vast dark universe is something that we must do if we are to survive this place.

name: Mass-Scale Biomass Production
description: The creation of biomass can be accomplished within large facilities which have the correct conditions for maximal biomass growth.

name: Reef Extension
description: Expanding these planetary reefs around the burning balls is possible if we have the will.

name: Rapid Regeneration Biomass
description: Biomass that has been treated with hyperonic radiation undergoes a substantial increase to its regeneration rate.

name: Inter-dimensional Breach extension
description: Pulsating rotational wave theory allows for inter-dimensional breaches to have increased longetivity.

name: Planet-Scale Biomass Production
description: Utilising the entirity of a solid world for biomass production requires new techniques as we cope with the gravity bound existence of this realm.

name: Inter-dimensional Breach Stability
description: Stabilising the breaches to and from fluidic space will increase their longetivity.

name: Solar Reef Scale Biomass Production
description: The anchored burning balls of gas that these gravity dwellers survive upon provide a wealth of materials that can be used to further our cause.

name: Inter-dimensional Breach Permanency
description: The energy requirements to open a breach to and from fluidic space are enormous, but new techniques could be utilised to maximise breach longetivity.

name: Bureau of Colonial Affairs
description: Colonies all have different needs at differing levels of development. Researching the colonisation process allows for any bottlenecks in colonisation to be fixed and the process to be smoothed out.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Police 1, Central Plaza 1, Central Temple 1, Central Temple Bajor 1, Central Plaza Terran 1, Central Plaza Confederacy 1, Tribute Humanity, Corporate Monument 1, Hall Heroes 1, Hall Justice 1, Tholian Hub 1, Central Temple Kinshaya 1

name: Rehabilitative Therapy
description: For minor crimes, rehabilitating the criminal may be possible if resources are invested in the education and counselling of these individuals.

name: Socio-cultural History Preservation
description: In order for our civilisation to make better decisions moving forward, we must learn from the successes and failures of our past. 'Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it.'

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Central Plaza 2, Central Temple 2, Central Temple Bajor 2, Central Plaza Terran 2, Central Plaza Confederacy 2, Corporate Monument 2, Hall Heroes 2, Hall Justice 2, Tholian Hub 2, Central Temple Kinshaya 2

name: Mass Media Manipulation
description: Media manipulation is a series of related techniques in which partisans create an image or argument that favours their particular interests. By researching techniques that work on alien races, we can ensure that our message is the only message that gets through.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Admin, Admin Hive | Starbase Building: Space Black Site

name: Ministry of the Interior
description: Before we can continue to expand our borders, we must look inwards and make sure our infrastructure is sound. Not only at home, but to our colonies as well.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Admin, Admin Hive

name: Distributed Local Governance
description: Discovering new cultures from the various empires we have encountered has caused us to develop new ways to spread those ideas across our empire. Let us build more towards this by striving to be one unified society, not just for our race, but multiple races as well.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Central Plaza 3, Central Temple 3, Central Temple Bajor 3, Central Plaza Terran 3, Central Plaza Confederacy 3, Corporate Monument 3, Hall Heroes 3, Hall Justice 3, Tholian Hub 3, Central Temple Kinshaya 3

name: Psychotectic Therapy
description: By modifying the minds of those under therapy, we can potentially remove deviations from the norm. There are potential side effects, however, which require further research.

name: Privatised Administration
description: Not all administration is required to come through the government. The ability to allow and trust private entities to look after their own administration is one that we should look into.

name: Local Subspace-Radio Forum
description: Research into subspace radio allows for communications over long distances. By opening subspace radio up to the population, we can increase our communications and logistics lines.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Buildings: Central Plaza 4, Central Temple 4, Central Temple Bajor 4, Central Plaza Terran 4, Central Plaza Confederacy 4, Corporate Monument 4, Hall Heroes 4, Hall Justice 4, Tholian Hub 4, Central Temple Kinshaya 4

name: Colonial Bureau of Penology
description: Penal systems can be unruly, but the introduction of a bureaucracy that deals specifically with penal issues can increase the productivity of indentured workers.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Penal Capital 2 | Decision: Planet Specialisation Configuration

name: High Security Prison
description: As technology grows more advanced every year, new incarceration techniques are required to ensure inmates are imprisoned correctly. The creation of a high security prison in space would ensure many high value citizens are stored in a secure, impossible to escape from, jail.

name: Psychotectic Treatments
description: Psychotectic treatments ae medical procedures in the course of psychotectic therapy. It can be used to eliminate all psychological elements of criminal behaviour in the rare cases when that is deemed necessary.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Penal Capital 2, Penal Capital 3, Penal Capital 4, Penal Capital Rure 2, Penal Slave Colony 2, Penal Slave Colony 3, Penal Slave Colony 4, Penal Slave Colony 5

name: Xeno-Archeology
description: Xenoarchaeology, a branch of xenology dealing with extraterrestrial cultures, is a form of archaeology. The field is concerned with the study of material remains to reconstruct and interpret past life-ways of alien civilisations.

name: Mobile Archaeological Lab
description: Portable scanners and ground machinery designed for the high accuracy work of archaeology can be combined into a mobile laboratory.

name: Archaeological Council
description: The creation of a centralised body to handle archaeological matters would allow more efficient usage of resources.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Religious Capital 2, Religious Capital 3, Religious Capital 4, Religious Capital Vulcan 2, Religious Capital Klingon 2, Religious Capital Hurq 2, Religious Capital Hurq 3, Religious Capital Hurq 4

name: Arcane Deciphering
description: The translation of dead languages is more an art than a science, with very little data to go from.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Decisions: Museum Exhibits Culture Perm, Museum Exhibits Entertainment Perm, Museum Exhibits Auction Perm

name: Ventanan Archaeology
description: Techniques utilised in archaeology of ancient races can be traced back to Ventanan techniques, an early archaeology system which assumes nothing and suggests everything.

name: Planetary Museum
description: Turning the entire surface of a world into a living museum where biological beings are stored, harvested, and controlled is the epihpany of Hur'Q curation.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Religious Capital Hurq 2, Hurq Curator Collection | Decision: Planet Specialisation Configuration

name: Path of the Righteous
description: The path which we have been guided towards is open before us. It is up to us to take the first step.

name: Planetary Consecration
description: Some worlds are retreats or havens which hold a special place amongst the spiritual realm. Dedicating an entire world to spiritual pursuits is a difficult affair.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Religious Capital 2, Religious Capital Vulcan 2, Religious Capital Klingon 2 | Decision: Planet Specialisation Configuration

name: Interstellar Conclave
description: Spiritual and religious behaviour requires adjustments once an empire spans multiple stars.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Religious Capital 2, Religious Capital 3, Religious Capital 4, Religious Capital Vulcan 2, Religious Capital Klingon 2

name: Iconian Archaeology
description: The Iconians disappeared hundreds of thousands of years ago, leaving behind advanced technology and ruins.

name: Paradise Planet
description: Dedicating a planet to the pursuits of happiness in numerous forms increases its desirability and the happiness of those already on the planet.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Generator Spec Retreat Garden, Admin Spec Retreat Dig

name: Tanerian Plague Treatment
description: The deadly Tanerian Plague, which appears to be manufactured rather than natural, can now be treated with new stimulants to slow down the disease.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Special Projects: Project, Project, Project

name: Tanerian Plague Cure
description: A cure for the remaining population against the Tanerian Plague can now be developed. Utilising modified blood-gas infusers, we can also cure the remaining population with the plague.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Special Projects: Project, Project, Project

name: Laurentian Plague Treatment
description: The deadly Laurentian Plague, which kills those infected via overstimulation, can now be treated with new stimulants to slow down the disease.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Special Projects: Project, Project, Project

name: Laurentian Plague Cure
description: A cure for the remaining population against the Laurentian Plague can now be developed. Utilising modified myelin regenerators, we can also cure the remaining population with the plague.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Special Projects: Project, Project, Project

name: Seripian Flu Treatment
description: The Seripian Flu, which is deadly if left untreated, can now be treated with new stimulants to slow down the disease.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Special Projects: Project, Project, Project

name: Seripian Flu Vaccine
description: A vaccine to immunise the remaining population against the Seripian Flu can now be developed. Utilising cellular regeneration and entertainment chambers, we can also cure the remaining population with the flu.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Special Projects: Project, Project, Project

name: Centauran Flu Treatment
description: The Centauran Flu, which kills its victims due to extreme lethargy, can now be treated with new stimulants to slow down the disease.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Special Projects: Project, Project, Project

name: Centauran Flu Vaccine
description: A vaccine to immunise the remaining population against the Centauran Flu can now be developed. Utilising cellular regeneration and entertainment chambers, we can also cure the remaining population with the flu.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Special Projects: Project, Project, Project

name: Ynorian Pox Treatment
description: The horrific contagious pustules that form and rupture upon the skin of a humanoid infected with the Ynorian Pox often lead to massive transmission rates, along with infection and death. New radical treatments could treat the symptoms and stop the spread.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Special Projects: Project, Project, Project

name: Ynorian Pox Vaccine
description: A vaccine to immunise the remaining population against the Ynorian Pox can now be developed. Utilising dermal regenerators and laser scalpels, we can also cure the remaining population with the pox.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Special Projects: Project, Project, Project

name: Kentaran Pox Treatment
description: The Kentaran pox, originally thought to be a mild form of measles, is in fact one of the most deadly diseases we have seen. Each burst blister immediately sears the flesh with massive amounts of pain, shutting the body down due to shock. New radical treatments could treat the symptoms and stop the spread.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Special Projects: Project, Project, Project

name: Kentaran Pox Vaccine
description: A vaccine to immunise the remaining population against the Kentaran Pox can now be developed. Utilising modified dermal regenerators, we can also cure the remaining population with the pox.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Special Projects: Project, Project, Project

name: Rhombic Paguphage Treatment
description: The disease, which starts out with relatively mild symptoms such as the urge to eat rhomboid shaped ice, is in fact extremely deadly when left untreated. We should now be able to research a treatment to slow down, if not cure the paguphage.

name: Rhombic Paguphage Cure
description: A cure for the Rhombic Paguphage can now be developed. Utilising modified cytoplasmic stimulators, we can also cure the remaining infected population.

name: Monoclinic Paguphage Treatment
description: The horrific Monoclinic Paguphage, which de-crystallises the helixes within living beings, is extremely deadly when unleashed in large population centres. We should now be able to research a treatment to slow down, if not cure the paguphage.

name: Monoclinic Paguphage Cure
description: A cure for the Monoclinic Paguphage can now be developed. Utilising modified protodynoplasers, we can also cure the remaining infected population.

name: Arxolite Corruption Treatment
description: The Arxolite Corruption, which works by changing the internal structure of the victim's crystalline chemistry leading to death, is a highly complex disease. We have learnt enough about it to be able to research a treatment to slow it down, if not cure it.

name: Arxolite Corruption Cure
description: A cure for Arxolite Corruption can now be developed. Utilising modified cortical inhibitors to corner the disease before eradication, we can also cure the remaining infected population.

name: Manxilite Corruption Treatment
description: The Manxilite Corruption, which works by infecting the crystalline pathways of the victims, is a highly complex pathogen. We have learnt enough about it to be able to research a treatment to slow it down, if not cure it.

name: Manxilite Corruption Cure
description: A cure for Manxilite Corruption can now be developed. Utilising modified thrombic modulators to convert the blood back to normal, we can also cure the remaining infected population.

name: Former Glory
description: This was once an ancient and proud race before it befell a calamity. Its ancient knowledge is still stored deep inside...

name: Unimatrix Adjunct Autonomy Protocols
description: Unimatrix adjuncts can now assist with the command and control of vessels across the galaxy, further improving naval capacity.

name: Hive Unicomplex Expansion
description: The expansion of the Unicomplex will provide additional segments available for housing drones, manufacturing or research.

name: The Call of the Great Beyond
description: Our citizens have heard, and answered, the creed of exploration. Some of our brightest minds have volunteered to serve on distant outposts, for the sake of expanding our territory.

name: Transportable Terrestrial Nanite Manufactury
description: Portable nanite manufacturies allow for the construction of armaments alongside assaulting armies.

name: Freeze Chamber
description: Our terraforming methods have allowed us to make great engineering strides on a specific type of building that makes the hostile planets we conquer or colonize feel like the glacial coldness we have grown to become accustomed too back home.

name: High-Pressure Steam Dome
description: Creating a colony dome that brings the atmosphere, pressure, and heat of Tholia to other worlds is of vital importance. Research into creating a standardised colony module for our ships must be a priority.

name: Steam Chamber
description: Our terraforming methods have allowed us to make great engineering strides on a specific type of building, making the hostile planets we conquer feel like the swirling magma pools of Tholia itself.

name: Bio-Fuels
description: A biofuel is a fuel that is produced through contemporary biological processes, such as agriculture and anaerobic digestion, rather than a fuel produced by geological processes, such as those involved in the formation of fossil fuels, as in coal and petroleum, from prehistoric biological matter.

name: Internal Security Protocols
description: Internal security is simply the act of keeping peace within the borders of a sovereign state. Responsibility for internal security may range from police to paramilitary forces, and in exceptional circumstances, the military itself.

name: Modernised Rituals
description: The ancient rituals must be adapted to suit a modern world, with technology working alongside the rituals to ensure the meaning and understanding of our past is not forgotten.

name: In-Vitro Genetic Resequencing
description: By genetically modifying young drones, we can ensure the drones are grown the exact requirements of the collective.

name: Nano-Enriched Diet
description: The assimilation of Species 874 has led to the creation of dietary requirements laced with nanites.

name: Advanced Habitation Methods
description: Increased populations lead to the requirement for more advanced means of comfortably accommodating the population and allowing habitats to thrive in all conditions.

description: Proper regulation of our industries and processes will lead to better planetary yields on all fronts, lest we drown ourselves in our own red tape.

description: Further applications of behavioral science allow for our government to manage the needs of more people more effectively and with less labour. Our local offices run so smoothly that long queues and wait times are almost entirely a thing of the past.

description: Now that our Infrastructure is on a firm foundation there's still further room for improvement at home and our colonies.
