name: Foundations of an Empire
description: Recent advances in the fields of computers allow us to develop management tools of sweeping power. Now we can turn our eyes to the needs of our Empire - it is large, and with that comes the need to solidify our holdings on each of planets.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Capital 5, Orbital Capital 5, Machine Capital 5, Borg Capital 5, Capital Terran 5, Capital Confederacy 5, Penal Slave Colony 5, Resort Capital 5, Cloning Capital 5, Commercial Capital 5, Forge Capital 5, Embassy Capital 5, Military Capital 5, University Capital 5, Undine Capital 5

name: Diplomatic Dispatches
description: Incremental improvements to our dispatches will enable any edicts issued in our name to be continued for a longer duration.

name: Regional Administration
description: Further applications of behavioral science allow for our government to manage the needs of more people more effectively and with less labour. Our local offices run so smoothly that long queues and wait times are almost entirely a thing of the past.

name: Streamlined Solar Bureaucracy
description: No longer confined to a singular world, the bureaucracy that comes with being a planetary nation no longer applies to a solar empire. By centralising control, improvements can be made to administration.

name: Colonial Bureaucracy
description: By further improving our computer networks and interfaces, adapting our institutions to suit the individual needs of each colony, and applying cutting-edge developments in sociology, psychology, and political science, we can manage more of our holdings directly without overburdening our bureaucrats.

name: Propaganda Transmissions
description: Unencoded broadcasts signaling our claims on nearby systems are a basic but effective foreign policy tool.

name: Manifest Destiny
description: We must have the courage to seize our fate and make true what was always meant to be.

name: Advanced Governmental Theory
description: Through elegantly crafted computer networks and an advanced understanding of sapient behavior, we can optimise our institutions to maximise efficiency while minimising corruption.

name: Galactic Ambitions
description: With the discovery of distant empires becoming more and more common each day, it is more important than ever to increase our own agendas and making sure our influence is known throughout the galaxy for centuries to come.

name: Imperial Capitol
description: The capitol provinces of an empire provide administration and leadership at the highest levels.

name: Optimisation Protocols
description: The Collective realises that there will never be enough processing power to accomplish everything within note. Shortages occur and surpluses exist. By changing protocols for individual systems, the Collective can ensure optimal efficiency for itself.

unlock_details.description: Building: Undine Arena | Edicts: Capacity Overload Machine, Production Targets Machine

name: Optimisation Protocols
description: Optimisation protocols allow the Collective to prioritise urgent, lacking areas of its infrastructure without harming the overall Collective.

unlock_details.description: Edicts: Capacity Overload Borg, Recovery Protocols Borg, Recovery Protocols Borg 2, Production Targets Borg, Borg Mass Assimilation

name: Alcove Array
description: Millions of arrays of alcoves combined together can be utilised to act as a secondary processing node for the Collective by utilising the organic brains of the drones. This allows for certain improvements to be made without major impact on the overall Collective.

unlock_details.description: Edicts: Education Campaign Machine, Recycling Campaign Machine

name: Alcove Matrix
description: Each alcove operates as part of a large matrix, allowing for the shifting of energy and resources rapidly and without disruption to the Collective as a whole. Entire matrices can be adjusted to entirely new protocols with minimal effort.

unlock_details.description: Edicts: War Drone Campaign Machine, Early Warning Machine

name: Party Competition Theory
description: The systems of the past had one thing in common: if you want to change something rapidly, you have to throw resources at it. Expanding this to a galactic scale may enable short-term substantial boosts to our worlds.

unlock_details.description: Edicts: Research Focus, Peace Festivals, Local Festival 1, Local Festival 2, Local Festival 3, Local Festival 4, Local Festival 5, Local Festival 6, Local Festival 7, Local Festival 8, Local Festival 9

name: Planetary Administration
description: Administration teams will help to streamline processes in the economic and logistics chains on our planets resulting in increased efficiency.

name: Planetary Unification
description: Ancient warring tribes, historic nations in conflict, now unified in empire. We must not, will not, crumble.

unlock_details.description: Edicts: Capacity Overload, Production Targets, Production Targets Atypical, Farming Subsidies, Farming Subsidies Nomad, Officer Subsidies, Officer Subsidies Machine, Officer Subsidies Borg, Production Targets Und, Officer Subsidies Undine

name: Interplanetary Unification
description: Unifying the nation states on a planet's surface is an important task in bringing planetary governments into the fold. By researching ways to do this effectively, we can increase our sway over entire worlds.

unlock_details.description: Edicts: Information Quarantine, Encourage Free Thought, Map The Stars

name: Interstellar Unification
description: Unifying planetary governments behind a centralised interstellar body is a difficult task, but researching ways that governance over planetary bodies can continue, whilst not crippling the empire with bureaucracy, is a vital task.

unlock_details.description: Building: Luxury Residence | Edicts: Land Of Opportunity, Diplomatic Grants, Early Warning, Undine Research Focus

name: Crowd Behavior Pattern Analysis
description: Coupling recent advances in the understanding of the behavior of individuals with new methods of analyzing large data sets allows us to predict how billions-strong groups of individuals will respond to the actions of our government. These methods constitute a powerful new tool for our propagandists - we can be more responsive than ever to the needs and concerns of our key supporters.

name: Governor Mansion
description: This palatial estate is not just a status symbol for our planetary governors, it is a state-of-the-art governmental facility in its own right. Adaptable dining halls can accommodate guests-of-honor of any species or culture with ease, and the living quarters are optimized to make the job of managing a planet as easy as possible, such that even a mediocre bureaucrat can govern a planet effectively.

name: Polity
description: Uniting the population behind a self-reflected cohesive force, such as identity, enables that polity to have to the capacity to mobilize resources rapidly where required. Entire campaigns can be created, as long as enough sway is behind it.

unlock_details.description: Edicts: Research Footing, Desperate Measures, Architectural Renaissance

name: Sovereignty
description: Sovereignty is the full right and power of a governing body over itself, without any interference from outside sources or bodies.

unlock_details.description: Edicts: Fortress Proclamation, Grand Fleet, The Weak Shall Perish

name: Imperial Charter
description: Sometimes the written form is the best way to convince our people that our traditions and beliefs are superior. Let us create a charter that reflects the benefits of our governing ethics for the rest of our subjects to finally understand what it means to be a part of something great.

name: Imperial Decree
description: We have come up with better methods to present our edicts in a more favorable light to our people, as a result implementing our edicts will now be less of a hassle for us.

name: Strategic Defense Initiative
description: The SDI project is our proposed strategy to deal with the realities of space travel and the potential for combat with alien races.

name: Space Superiority
description: Our continued advances with the construction of interstellar ships have developed a need for more specialised bridge designs for our spaceships. More importantly, if we are going to explore the stars we must better prepare ourselves for the dangers or perhaps enlightenment that comes with exploring the unknown.

name: Space Combat Doctrines
description: Gradual adaptation to the realities of deep-space combat allows us to effectively coordinate larger manoeuvres.

name: Naval Command Buoy Network
description: By placing navigational markers across sectors of space we have already explored, not only provides an aide or safety for our people that travel the stars, but it also increases the capacity for us to deploy more ships to protect what we already own.

name: Fluid Fleet Templates
description: By standardising our designs even more, we can now mass produce our starships at a much faster rate.

name: Interstellar Warfare
description: War is sometimes inevitable and if this is going to be the case we must expand our fleet capacity even further, so that our empire will feel secure from our rivals.

name: Fleet Management Procedures
description: As our empire grows, further bureaucracy is required to control the vast amount of logistics and supply in our fleets, stretching light-years across the galaxy.

name: Interstellar Logistics
description: The vast distances between worlds and sectors require a special kind of logistics system. Components can be assembled on multiple worlds, and coordinating their arrival together requires complex mathematics. Further research into this subject can ensure our logistics will keep up with the demands of our fleets.

name: Interstellar Communication Network
description: Further advances to our subspace communications will allow us the ability to be in constant contact with our most far reaching outposts.

name: Modular Armada Formations
description: Introducing common formation terminology amongst our vessels will help us grow more accustomed to working in large cohesive formations.

name: Fleet Liaison
description: A fleet liaison officer is an officer who represented the interests of his or her home government's fleet. This enables more political control to be offered to the admiral commanding the fleet, allowing larger fleet sizes.

name: Prospector's Union
description: The lowliest of workers are easily forgotten in a galactic-scale bureaucracy, and without someone to advocate for their interests, those forgotten workers can easily become disaffected. Centralized representation for labourers increases the perception of fairness and good governance throughout our empire.

name: Admiralty Support Staff
description: Attachs and aides can only do so much - as the distances between fleets and battles grow further and further apart, more highly trained staff are required to ensure the swift resolution of any issues involving our fleets.

name: Distributed Fleet Logistics
description: By carefully planning our resources accordingly within our fleet we can increase our logistics to support additional naval capacity.

unlock_details.description: Building: Naval Depot 1 | Starbase Building: Logistics Office

name: Planetary Defense Perimeter
description: By synchronising all of our orbiting defense satellites and ground-to-space weapon emplacements, we will enable our planets to defend themselves much more effectively than in the past.

name: Fortress World
description: Bristling with turrets, mines, weapons facilities and forges, the Fortress World is an almost impenetrable world that stands as a bastion against enemies.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Military Capital 3 | Decision: Planet Specialisation Configuration

name: Special Forces Training
description: Let us come up with better methods to improve our armies for when the situation arises.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Military Capital 3, Military Capital 4, Military Capital 5 | Edict: Conscription Campaign

name: Solar Defense Perimeter
description: The ability to locate optimal approach avenues allows for the consolidation of defenses to protect planetary bodies.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Military Capital 3, Military Capital 4, Military Capital 5

name: Interdimensional Communication Array System
description: The ability to open small subspace portals for communications and orders across large portions of the quadrant will dramatically improve the amount of naval capacity we are able to handle.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Megastructures: Build Stage, Build Complete

name: Space Training
description: Operating within a zero-gravity environment and out in deep space requires a different kind of training to that used by armed forces in the past.

name: Merchant Marines
description: The supply and logistics required for vessels over the vast reaches of outer space require a radical new outlook on civilian and military vessels.

name: Interstellar Campaigns
description: The logistics of interstellar war require a good deal of planning to take place before we lay claim to any territory or make any demand on our adversaries. A massive quantity of statistical data has been compiled to aid in that planning phase, with the result that we can reliably expect more of our desires to be enforced in any given conflict.

name: Optimal Bridge Design
description: Our engineers continue to come up with more innovative starship bridge designs especially with the stations surrounding a starship bridge. One such design is more tactical in nature and better suited for possible combat encounters a starship may encounter during interstellar travel.

name: Long-Term Space Habitation
description: Space is infinite, to that end we need to make sure our crew and supplies is well taken care of for the long journeys that space travel entails.

name: Interstellar Fleet Traditions
description: A body of knowledge regarding combat behaviors is useless without a strong code governing its use.

unlock_details.description: Country Limits: Shuttle Limit, Attack Ship Limit | Ship Types: Shuttle, Shuttle Kivra, Shuttle Tajen | Starbase Building: Academy

name: Master Situation Monitor
description: The Master Situation Monitor summarizes the huge amount of data monitored by a starship's computer into a single display for the ship's bridge officers. This streamlined system allows the commanders, engineers, and tactical officers to ascertain the most important variables affecting the vessel's performance quickly, allowing them to make informed decisions even in the chaos of battle.

name: Mothball Fleets
description: Older vessels can be scrapped, or alternatively kept in mothballs, a state of waiting where they can be brought back to readiness rapidly. Research must be conducted into how the maintenance of these vessels should be managed.

name: Holographic Command Centre
description: Incorporating holodeck technology into our starship bridges means that we can adapt our interfaces to the needs of a situation, as well as the preferences and unique needs of their operators. Whether exploring, engaging in diplomacy, or in battle, our officers will always have exactly the resources they need at their fingertips.

name: Automated Repair Depot
description: A highly automated, fully stocked repair depot capable of replicating and repair damage across a wide spectrum of vessels.

name: Tricyclic Life Support System
description: Triple-redundant life support systems offer increased survivability to the crew of a stricken vessel.

name: Mobile Repair Depot
description: Due to our constant studies of field repairs we think we have made a significant breakthrough. By introducing this new component within our battleships we believe it can be an effective method to now act as the staging point that will send out mobile repair units to our surrounding ships that will automatically start repairing damaged parts of the affected ships out in space.

name: Emergency Command Hologram
description: In the event that the crew aboard a starship is incapacitated or otherwise unable to control the vessel, an emergency command hologram can take control of the vessel.

name: Nano-Repair Bots Injectors
description: Advances in nanotechnology have allowed us to equip our mobile repair units with Nano-Repair Bots. They are able to repair and rebuild any damaged system on the molecular, and even atomic, level.

name: Black Alert Drills
description: Black alert encourages all crew get to their stations to prepare for experiment conditions. The randomised nature of these drills teaches the crew to think outside the box.

name: Self-Assembling Fleet
description: Our medical scientists have been experimenting with Nanotechnology for quite some time. In our studies of these robotic creatures we think it is now possible to improve upon this tech at an engineering level as well. Now our newly designed Nanobots can use these new forms of nanites and apply it to our ship building process to save ourselves some of the cost that goes into upgrading our starships.

name: Cetacean Studies
description: The return of the Cetaceans to Earth has opened up a whole new division of science. Working with these extremely intelligent mammals produces excellent research opportunities.

name: Defense Node
description: An entire node dedicated to the protection of nearby nodes and districts.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Building: Military Camp Borg 1

name: Armoured Exo-Plating
description: The installation of armoured exo-plating to the body of a drone can increase survivability and combat effectiveness.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Army Types: Occupation Army, Occupation Army

name: Cortical Processing Unit
description: The Collective gathers a vast amount of information. We need a way to better assimilate and disseminate this data. Combining our advanced knowledge of computational systems with our cyborg nature, we should be able to create a type of cortical processing subunit. Each unit will be responsible for sorting and distributing data to the drones aboard a vessel or unicomplex.

name: Autonomous Regeneration Sequencer
description: Detecting damage early and repairing it without needing to confirm with the Collective enables our vessels to undertake rapid repairs, even in the heat of battle.

unlock_details.description: Other: component, Custom | Districts: Research Node, Admin Hive

name: Will of the Collective
description: The Will of the Collective is the power to compel drones into action without regard to their wellbeing, safety, or health. This will enable an extremely efficient army of drones that will stop at nothing to complete their goal.

name: Modular Cybernetic Limbs
description: Modular limb attachments ranging from heavy weaponry to repair tools can enable a tactical drone to perform numerous tasks with efficiency.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Army Type: Borg Heavy | Building: Military Camp Borg 2 | Districts: Research Node, Admin Hive

name: Strength in Numbers
description: By utilising neurolinked transceivers in each drone we can form networks utilising the processing power of each drone to problem solve. More drones increases the computational power available.

name: Emergency Hive Defensive Protocols
description: The activiation of emergency reserves will allow all drones in hibernation status to reactivate for a short period of time and non-essential duties will be suspended until the crisis is over.

name: Adaptive Combat Software
description: Research is underway into refining the algorithms necessary to constantly evaluate and adapt to enemy tactics.

name: Hive Defense Perimeter
description: Sentry nodes with active scanners will boost the threat detection radius of all our drones substantially.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Research Node, Admin Hive

name: Shielded Thoracic Assembly
description: Most of our efforts to keep drones functioning while their vessel is under attack have focused on repairing them or allowing them to function for longer without requiring regeneration. Although it will likely require proportionally more resources to achieve and enact, we should investigate ways of making drones more resistant to damage.

unlock_details.description: Army Type: Borg Terror | Building: Military Camp Borg 4

name: Vacuum Pressure Nanite Injector
description: When exposed to the null pressure of vacuum, traditional repair nanites and repair procedures report a very low success rate. By installing redundant vacuum pressure injectors across the Collective's vessels, repair procedures can be undertaken even when a vessel is heavily damaged.

unlock_details.description: Other: component, Custom | Districts: Research Node, Admin Hive

name: Combat Adaptation Algorithms
description: Recursive. Weapon damage on tactical unit 3421. Adapting shielding frequencies on other units. Recursive. Weapon damage on tactical unit 3420 negated. Recursive.

name: Planetary Defenses
description: There may come a time when other races regard our worlds with great envy, and draw plans to attack us. We must be ready.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Buildings: Military Academy 1, Military Academy Hirogen 1, Military Academy Andoria 1, Military Academy Stragegos 1, Military Camp 1

name: Combat Training
description: Creating dedicated headquarters for all levels of military operations shapes an efficient fleet, and lays a better foundation for future military training.

name: Global Defense Initiative
description: If we are to be a long-lasting empire, it is vital that we come up with ways to better protect what we already have.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Military Academy 2, Military Academy Hirogen 2, Military Academy Andoria 2, Military Academy Stragegos 2, Military Camp 2, Planetary Shield 1, Undine Academy 2

name: Galactic Defensive War Theory
description: With our continued advancement into the understanding of military theory we can come up with new ways to fortify the planets our people are living in at an immense scale.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Research, Research Node, Admin, Admin Hive, Admin Undine

name: Combined Arms
description: Having a centralized command structure has worked wonders for our armies. So much to the point that the cost of maintaining our army can be decreased in an efficient manner.

unlock_details.description: Army Types: Artillery, Artillery Robot | Edicts: War Drone Campaign, Fleet Focus

name: Centralised Army Command
description: With the need for expansion comes the need to protect what we already own. Having a structure where our military command is centralised can go a long way in increasing the efficiency in which our armies are built, plus decreasing the cost to maintain them as well.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Research, Admin, Admin Hive, Admin Undine

name: National Pride
description: Having pride in one's national identity can be a useful tool for the military-industrial complex.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Research Node, Admin, Admin Hive, Admin Undine

name: Fortified Ground Command
description: Heavy ground fortifications must be able to withstand warp age bombardment and advanced electronic counter measures in order to protect a planet.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Research, Research Node, Admin, Admin Hive

name: Occupation Doctrine
description: The occupation and control of an entire population with minimal ground forces requires new thinking.

name: Central Naval Command
description: With our fleet growing to ever-expanding numbers and our continued advances in the field of logistics, we have now developed a way for us to track our fleets at an unprecedented level. Since our fleets are now easily tracked across many light-years via central command, our ability to control them is improved.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Research, Research Node, Admin, Admin Hive, Admin Undine

name: Global Defense Grid
description: The transition from armed forces defending individual countries to armed forces defending a world has new complications and avenues that must be fully discovered before a proper armed force capable of being deployed across a system is developed.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Districts: Research, Research Node, Admin, Admin Hive, Admin Undine

name: Aggressive Conditioning
description: Iterating on the standard conditioning regimen for ground troops has proven to make them more effective in direct combat.

name: Nerve Dampener
description: Careful tuning of pain receptors allows soldiers to fight through what would previously have been debilitating injuries.

name: Galactic Campaigns
description: Conflict between vast space empires has been a fact of life for long enough for the development of an entire academic field devoted specifically to the study of interstellar warfare. With this new generation of top-tier experts on hand as advisors, we can be assured of even more efficiency in planning and carrying out our military campaigns.

name: Field Testing
description: Live-fire testing of weaponry is required to get a true understanding of real-world applications. Perhaps we could use a planet?

name: Planetary Defenses Consolidation
description: By synchronising all of our orbiting defense satellites and ground-to-space weapon emplacements, we will enable our planets to defend themselves much more effectively than in the past.

name: Corporate Ethos
description: Being ruled by corporations rather than ineffectual democratic governments is best.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Military Academy 3, Military Academy Hirogen 3, Military Academy Andoria 3, Military Academy Stragegos 3, Military Camp 3, Undine Academy 3

name: Command School
description: Learning from the military mistakes of the past is vitally important when our entire species existence is on the line.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Military Academy 4, Military Academy Hirogen 4, Military Academy Andoria 4, Military Academy Stragegos 4, Military Camp 4, Undine Academy 4

name: Advanced Energy Weapons
description: Continual improvements to the manufacturing of the focusing, powering and emittance of high energy pulses can be transferred to weapon design.

name: Master Strategists
description: For nine millennia, the Zakdorn have been regarded by other races as having the greatest innately strategic minds in the galaxy. Our edge lies in maintaining this facade.

name: Recruitment Drive
description: Attracting, selecting, and appointing suitable candidates for our naval positions is of vital importance. Research into how best to retain and attract the best and brightest can ensure we can always recruit the best.

name: Advanced Guerrilla Tactics
description: The vast technological advances of the last century open up a whole new world of options for creative military commanders to outrun and outlast numerically superior opponents. We can analyse these tactical innovations and add them to the standard curriculum for our cadets, whether they are to be used to outmaneuver a larger opponent or merely to counter similar tactics by our opponents.

name: Civilian Militia
description: If we allow the formation of a civilian militia, it could help to ease the constant strain on our regular military officers, thereby letting them focus more on their training, enhancing their training speed.

name: Reaction-Based Psychological Evaluation
description: The violent stimuli and psychiatric processes associated with battle are so far beyond what any normal being goes through that specific psychological evaluations can be designed in order to ensure soldiers do not freeze up or panic during battle.

name: Neo-Wayne Salvo Model
description: A combat salvo analysis that studied the effective use of photon torpedoes. The Neo-Wayne Model is considered to be more traditional than the Onafuwa model.

name: Advanced Holographic Field Training
description: While the most obvious use of holodeck technology is recreational, it also carries significant military applications. Holodecks provide on-demand access to an effectively endless variety of intense, realistic training scenarios for students at our academy, such that a recently-minted ensign can have a quality and quantity of field experience on par with that of a seasoned officer.

name: Holographic Training Centre
description: Rather than teaching new warriors the dangerous and time-consuming nature of seeking out worthy prey, holographic representations can satiate the warriors' needs and teach valuable lessons.

name: Tsunkatse Broadcasting Network
description: Updating blood sports to utilise advances in technology allows challenges to be created of differing skill levels, entertainment and prestige. Broadcasting the fights across numerous star systems utilising the latest technologies brings benefits too.

name: Human Perseverance
description: Humanity has undergone countless horrors over the centuries but still endures with a brighter future than ever.

name: The D'jarra
description: The D'jarra is the Bajoran caste system, used by the Bajorans to create a stratified social hierarchy. Everyone is born into a specific caste of D'jarras based on their family, determining their occupation.

name: Privateer Corps
description: Armed ships owned by private individuals have been used in the past to bolster navies, as long as they are issued the correct letter of marque.

name: Romulan Senate
description: The Romulan Senate is the main governing body of the Romulan Star Empire, seated in the Senate chamber located on the planet Romulus.

name: The Great Material River
description: Ferengi see the universe as having 'millions of worlds, all with too much of one, and not enough of the other', with the Great Continuum flowing through them all like a mighty river, from have to want and back again. As such, it was the force that bound the universe together. To get everything you want in life, you had to have your ship navigate the Continuum with entrepreneurial skill and grace.

name: Ferengi Bar Association
description: The Rules of Acquisition are the cornerstone of Ferengi culture. A list of numbered aphorisms that describe how to do business, exemplified by rules such as Rule 1, 'Once you have their money, you never give it back'.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Ferengi Bar, Private Mining Consortium, Ferengi Holosuite

name: Obsidian Order
description: The Obsidian Order is the primary intelligence agency of the Cardassian Union.

name: Central Command
description: The Central Command is the military authority of the Cardassian Union. Officially, it reports to the civilian Detapa Council, but unofficially, it rules the Cardassian Union.

name: Cardassia First
description: Cardassia First, above all else. Cardassians must work together to form a perfect Union, and any dissidents or alien influences must be crushed.

name: High Council
description: The High Council is the legislature and ruling body of the Klingon Empire, containing the leaders of the Great Houses of the Empire. It is often tasked with electing a Chancellor to lead the Empire.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Army Type: Army | Building: Government 1 Klingon

name: The Story of the Promise
description: A Klingon legend speaks of the end of Kahless, the Unforgettable. He instructed his people at the time: 'You are Klingons. You need no one but yourselves. I will go now to Sto-vo-kor. But I promise one day I will return.'

name: Sword of Honour
description: Kahless created the bat'leth by dropping a length of his hair into some lava from inside the Kri'stak Volcano. Then cooling, shaping, and hardening it in the lake of Lursor. He united the Klingon people with this tale.

name: Thrill of the Hunt
description: The threat of danger, the taste of fear in the air, the exultation and pride as prey is located and hunted. All these sensations come from the thrill of the hunt - whether you catch the prize at the end is irrelevant, as long as the chase is there.

name: Teaching of Surak
description: A legendary Vulcan scientist, philosopher, and logician. He is the father of logical Vulcan as we know it. His teachings turned his people from war to science and philosophy, and would greatly benefit our society in the same manner.

name: Next Level Plastic Surgery
description: Skin stretching and toxin purges, the Son'a will do anything to extend their lives.

name: Curation Techniques
description: The curation of entire biological species is a hallmark of the insectoid Hur'Q.

name: Karemman Trade League
description: The Karemma believe in fair dealing and cautious business practices and regard cheating or gambling to be taboo.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Commercial Forum, Food Conglomerate, Public Relations Office

name: Ritualised Debating
description: Tellarites take great pleasure in arguing for the sake of seeing who can come up with better reasoning and supporting evidence. Although this has led to great misunderstandings, once their culture became understood, this concept led to an openness and willingness to confront ideas and the established order, in turn leading to a society governed by reason, rather than tradition and spiritualism.

name: Norcadian Franchise Authority
description: The lucrative business of the franchising of popular sports and events across the galaxy is where the Norcadians have developed their wealth.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Offworld Tsunkate, Private Shipyards, Military Contractors

name: Central Mainframe
description: Bynar society is made up of pairs of Bynar forming an individual. Their entire society is implanted with cybernetic implants at birth, with the giant cybernetic consensus being conducted through a central computer mainframe.

name: Orion Commodity Standards
description: Priding themselves on delivering only the highest quality goods, the Orions have a set standard for their business practice. It wouldn't do to deliver substandard rebellious goods.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Slave Bazaar, Underground Clubs, Pirate Haven

name: Yridian Research Brokership
description: The trading of ideas has been expanded into the business of the trading of information. Information is ammunition.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Information Broker, Underground Chemists, Smuggling Rings

name: Fragmented Travellers
description: Six different intelligent species developed on Xindus. As the result of a brutal civil war between the six species that destroyed the planet, the fragmented survivors have united together under the governance of the Xindi Council.

name: Slaver Companies
description: Whilst researching ways of privatising exploitation of resources, our researchers came upon the idea of private companies which can exploit native populations and resources alongside our naval forces. Offering these private charters could be extremely lucrative.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Army Type: Army | Bombardment Stance: Raiding

name: Funeral Rites Modernisation
description: Waste not, want not.

name: Ancient Doctrines
description: This is the way of the Doctrine, as it has always been.

name: Hunter Culture
description: We do not sow.

name: The Danger of the Xeno
description: As the rightful rulers of the entire galaxy, the Xeno scum remain a threat and a nuisance to Husnockian dominance.

name: Communication Protocol Masters
description: Improvements in subspace communication channels allow for more coherent administrative direction.

name: The Maje Council
description: The clans fight amongst themselves, with each Maje acting as First Maje. The council attempts to corral the Majes into some sort of united front.

name: Space Corps
description: The first members of a species into space are part of their space corps and are often the bravest members of that species.

name: Efficient Resource Exploitation
description: Part of a stratified, ordered society is the efficient nature of production. The Cardassians have a unique ability to exploit natural resources efficiently.

name: Oschean Hunting Practices
description: Designing worthy prey and giving them advantageous terrain to call their own makes the hunt all the more thrilling. The Tosk are the ultimate prey.

name: Andorian Royal Guard
description: The Royal Imperial Guard has traditions spanning back centuries, since before the first icebreakers travelled across Andoria.

name: Undine Infiltration Army
description: The Undine infiltrators have the ability to become their enemy before attacking, causing havoc and chaos.

unlock_details.description: Army Type: Undine | Building: Undine Academy 1 | Edict: War Undine Campaign

name: MACO
description: Military Assault Command Operations troops (MACOs) are some of the best-trained in the quadrant. Extensively drilled in top-of-the-line simulations at a variety of locations across the Sol system, MACOs are more than mere infantry, whose broad training and high mobility allow them to conduct operations in any environment.

name: The Prime Directive
description: No starship may interfere with the normal development of any alien life or society before they develop warp capabilities.

name: Frontier Philosophy
description: Offering the thrill of adventure and incentives to those brave enough to take on the new frontiers of space allows for more resources to be given to this path.

name: Mass-Scale Population Engineering
description: The cloning process now allows major adjustments to the genome to handle the data sets from the growing cloned cells before it can be introduced on a mass scale.

unlock_details.description: Decisions: Punishment Disease, End Punishment Disease

name: Mass-Scale Fluidic Modification
description: The spawning process now allows major adjustments to the genome to handle the data sets from the growing fluidic cells before it can be introduced on a mass scale.

name: Eugenics Bio Modification
description: Genetic engineering, genetic programming, or genetic manipulation is a process in which the DNA of an organism is selectively altered through artificial means. Genetic engineering is often used to produce custom organisms.

name: Mass-Scale APU Modification
description: Learning to surpass the restrictions placed upon our metal shells is part of the process towards becoming perfect beings.

name: Romulan Ingenuity
description: The tenacity and cunning of the Romulans allows new unique designs that can defeat those who stand before them.

name: Think Tank
description: Thinking outside the box has often provided some of the most beneficial technologies in our existence. The creation of an entire research programme dedicated to those who are known to discover unique solutions to problems will increase the likelihood that we can research these rarer technologies.

name: Benzite Efficiency
description: The meticulous nature of the Benzites stems from their unerring need to prove themselves better than their peers. This competition results in workers who will not only find problems but come up with solutions for them before presenting the issue.

name: Monumental Hegemony
description: The ancient Gorn Hegemony has created monuments that stretch across the surface of Gornar. Whilst many building techniques are outdated, they are still useful in constructing the new larger buildings upon the surface.

name: Pheromonal Negotiation
description: The introduction of pheromones into the negotiation process can render opponents very susceptible to the attractiveness of our trade deals.

name: Rigel Commerce Lobby
description: The Rigel Commerce Lobby has existed for centuries and allows for a fair and balanced trading platform across many races.

name: Imperial Bureaucracy
description: The Romulan Senate is centuries old and allowed for the creation of a multiplanet empire. Their procedures for statecraft are vast but cover a multitude of subjects and industries.

name: Cell Ship Modularity
description: The Suliban have been forced to adapt for many years, where individual needs are discarded in view of what is required for the greater good, and their designs reflect this. Individual ships coming together to form a greater whole.

name: Orbital High Command
description: The centralisation of orbital military power within one authority allows for the substantial command and control over the defensive assets within a system.

name: Kahless and Lukara
description: At the dawn of the Klingon Empire, five hundred warriors assaulted the Great Hall of Qam-Chee. The city garrison was routed with only Kahless and Lukara holding their ground. Ever since then, highly ritualised processes have been an integral part of Klingon life.

name: Digital Duality
description: The pairing of Bynars allows for a harmonious coupling with vast efficiency gains.

name: Lyaksti'kton Galactic Trading League
description: The Saurians have long had trading partners within their league, and maintaining those trade links is important for a growing empire.

name: Guild Membership
description: The Xepolite Guilds have maintained a substantial sway over the political bodies due to their high standards for their guildsfolk and their strict rules for trading partners.

name: Empathic Metamorphs
description: The joint Kriosian and Valtese people can produce great empathic metamorphs as rulers that provide stability and peace for many worlds.

name: Superior Strategy
description: For millenia the Zakdorn have been undefeated, and the Zakdorn with the most potential are trained every day in the Strategos.

name: Yridian Information Network
description: The information network of the Yridians is a vast, branching organic business where everything is for sale. To an Yridian, information IS ammunition.

name: Mythological Dictionary
description: The vast Tamarian language is made up of allegory, with many stories being passed down from generation to generation. This allows a unique way of expression which can be useful to traders or diplomats alike.

name: Plastic Surgeon Alliance
description: The Son'a may not have the most aesthetically pleasing medical care, but their plastic surgery and rejuvenation therapies are second to none.

name: Commission on Political Traitors
description: There will always be those who act against the best wishes of the government, and the commission is designed to root them out before lasting damage can be caused.

name: Peer-to-Peer Protocol Relay Stations
description: Direct connections with other relay stations provide a rapid and mostly secure method of long-distance communication.

name: Commercial Republic
description: The accumulation of material wealth is no longer a priority, but economics of providing the most resources to the most important sectors is still valuable.

name: Trill Symbiosis Commission
description: The Trill Symbiosis Commission manages the transfer and selection of Joined Trill candidates, who offer a wealth of expertise from their previous hosts.

name: Valerian Freeholds
description: Allowing citizens to own vast tracts of land under contract on new worlds results in many more volunteers wishing to start a new life off world.

name: Xenogenic Society
description: The different genomes and phenotypes that make up the five main Xindi species requires a unique way of life in order to cope with the different demands placed upon it by each member.

name: Acamarian Clan Politics
description: The ability of the feuding Acamarian clans to unite under one banner, whilst retaining their individuality, is nothing short of remarkably. Applying the same lessons to ourselves could achieve wonders.

name: Will of the Prophets
description: The Bajoran religion is based on a reverence of aliens that live in a nearby wormhole. They make their will known through assorted orbs, codexes, and instructions to members of the Bajoran clergy.

name: Vulcan Expeditionary Group
description: The Vulcan Expeditionary Group is a Vulcan organization. Members are usually trained at the Vulcan Learning Center and the Vulcan Science Academy.

name: Bolian Economics
description: Trade and the intricate relationships between currencies have been the most influential forces in Bolian society, and they have developed a deep understanding of these forces, making Bolian institutions highly stable and influential. Some say that it is the Bank of Bolias that holds the true power in the Alpha Quadrant: the fortunes of a trillion sentients wax and wane with its funds rate.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Bolias Bank Hq 1, Bolias Bank 2

name: Ushaan Legalisation
description: The 'Code of the Ushaan' is a law regarding death-by-combat and legal instruments, governing the assorted ritual aspects of Andorian society.

name: Denobulan Xenology Department
description: The communal nature of the Denobulans leads them to be inquisitive about others, and the Xenology Department leads the way in discovering fascinating facts about alien societies.

name: Pack Hunting
description: Throughout history, Anticans have hunted in packs, for efficient killing and protection. This has extended to their society, as they have become a spacefaring people, tending to group together into packs for protection.

name: Betazed Empaths Trader Guild
description: Using their telepathic and empathic nature, Betazoids tend to be able to tell when a business transaction is going awry or one party is ahead of the others.

name: Feline Supplements
description: The general food and entertainment sources for Caitians can also be used by other species to provide a nutritional, pleasing diet. Caitnip is also very popular amongst the youth.

name: Telepathic Pain Absorbtion
description: Deltans are telepathic and empathic, allowing them to sense other people's emotions and administer medical aid by absorbing and minimizing pain. This 'Mind meld anesthesia' means Deltans make excellent medical personnel.

name: Commercial Enterprise
description: Commercial enterprises may be used to great effect when carefully regulated, allowing more trade to flow to the most critical parts of the empire.

name: Bank of Luria
description: The Bank of Luria holds vast stores of material wealth from around the galaxy. Its secure vaults stretch deep underground, and there are rumours that a river made entirely of liquid latinum flows beneath.

name: Disrupting the Pack
description: The Selay are used to being hunted, and as such, utilise superior tactics to surround and ambush the packs that attack them.

name: Pelagic Food Cultivation
description: Whilst harvesting lifeforms and small amounts of naturally growing food from pelagic planets is commonplace, the Antedeans take it to a whole other level. Immense kelp farms on their world allow naturally grown kelp to feed millions. Applying their teachings to our own pelagic worlds will allow for the construction of kelp farms.

name: Talarian War Games
description: Talarians follow a strict set of traditions and customs and encourage warrior-like behavior amongst their people. They are very competitive with games, tests, and competitions as an important part of their culture. By incorporating some of their teachings, we can improve our readiness.

name: Pakled Scavenger Guilds
description: Pakleds will convert anything they can get their hands on. The Scavenger Guilds specialise in appropriating technology and using it to the benefit of the Pakled Clans.

name: Undine Biological Infestation
description: The biological perfection of the Fluidic realm once introduced into the genetic material of the outside world begins to convert everything it touches. All organic material is transformed into the Biomatter of the Fluidic Realm.

unlock_details.description: Other: Custom | Decisions: Undine Infect Planet 1, Undine Infect Planet 2 | Edict: Undine Conscription Campaign | Starbase Building: Spawner

name: Bio-World Creation
description: Through long forgotten techniques our scientists have relearnt the ancient art of sculpting the Biomass proto worlds of Fluidic Space into fully habitable Bio-Worlds ready for colonisation.

unlock_details.description: Other: diplo_action | Ascension Perk: World Shaper | Building: Undine Temple

name: Undine Supreme Genetics
description: Undine biology is unmatched in its power and dominance over anything that stands in its way, but even this biology needs improvement and the Undine genetic modification ability allows the Undine to perfect this.

name: Bio Torpedo
description: Compacting Bio Matter and enfusing with mutualistic bacteria creates an explosive on-par with anti-matter.

name: Charged Bio Torpedo
description: Pre-charged Bio Matter thats been enfused with mutualistic bacteria creates an further instabilities with the torpedo and a higher weapon yield.

name: High Density Bio Torpedo
description: Increasing the density of the Bio Mass before infusing creates a purer form of the torpedo, which in turn adds to the damage radius.

name: InterPhased Bio Torpedo
description: Offsetting the phase modulation of the Bio Mass generates mltiple instabilities within the detonation sequence this subsequently results in superior damage.

name: Multi-Phased Bio Torpedo
description: Adding a multi-phase modulation to the Bio Mass generates mltiple instabilities within the detonation sequence this subsequently results in superior damage and range.

name: Enriched Chroniton Bio Torpedo
description: Enriched Chroniton particles infused with raw Bio Matter cause extreme devastation.

name: Augmented Warriors
description: Using technology developed during Earth's Eugenics War and factoring advancements procured from other species over the years the current crop of Augmented soldiers are stronger, faster and more deadly than ever before.

name: Advanced Augmented Warriors
description: Breakthroughs in genetic conditioning result in warriors that are ever more adapted to commanding starships or at ground combat.

name: Xeno Diplomacy
description: Communications with alien lifeforms without mutual understanding of the cultures or historical background is a recipe for disaster. By researching possible first contact scenarios, we can at least issue formal instructions on first contact and diplomatic procedures.

unlock_details.description: Building: Resort Risa | Diplomatic Action: Invite To Federation

name: High Security Black Site
description: Daystrom Station was a Federation space station that served as a high-security black site of the Daystrom Institute.

name: Karemman Trading Posts
description: The Karemma represent the Gamma Quadrant's major trading entitiy and their trading posts allow the storage of valuable resources.

name: Dosi Hostile Negotiations Tactics
description: The Dosi placed great importance on business and were extremely aggressive negotiators, to the point that fatalities were not uncommon.

name: Marine Detachment
description: Space combat is usually reserved for phasers, torpedoes however on occasions it is necessary to fight hand to hand. Marine training onboard a starship is specialised work.

name: Advanced Ship Marine Training
description: Advanced training methods allow for greater ship boarding and crew to crew fighting methods, utilizing the unique contours of a starship.

name: Starfleet Marine Detachment
description: The Starfleet Marine Corps, or simply the Starfleet Marines, are the infantry forces of the Federation's Starfleet. Unlike the rest of Starfleet's service personnel, who used a naval ranking structure, the Marines use a rank structure based on equivalents of Earth infantry-based militaries, such as the MACOs.

name: Klingon Raiding Techniques
description: The honour and glory of ship to ship combat is bountiful, but nothing comes close to the feel of a Bat'leth in a warriors hand and the taste of a foes blood on your tongue.

name: Klingon Boarding Squadrons
description: Specially trained warriors trained in hit and run tactics prepared to board enemy vessels and cause as much damage as possible.

name: Klingon Invasion Mastery
description: A Klingon warrior is prepared to give their lives in service of the empire and these elite forces are prepared to give their lives to damage or capture their target.

name: Hunting Party
description: The Hunt is always on and what better place than on our preys own ship.

name: Beta Hunting Party
description: Led by the Hirogen Beta the hunting party is prepared to take the hunt to the preys ship.

name: Alpha Hunting Party
description: Led by the Hirogen Alpha the hunting party is prepared to take the hunt to the preys ship.

name: Jem'Hadar Boarding Party
description: The Jem'Hadar look to board enemy vessels as soon as their shields are down, attacking with a ferocity that distracts the opposing crew from defending their ship allowing for an easier victory.

name: Jem'Hadar Alpha Troopers
description: The Alpha Jem'Hadar use specially developed tactics to board and take over an enemy vessel.

name: The Mars Utopia Planitia Project
description: Utopia Planitia Fleet Yards, also known as Utopia Planitia Starfleet Yards or Utopia Planitia Shipyards, was a key Starfleet vessel construction and design facility in the 24th century. The facility included several large drafting rooms for starship design and planetary facilities on the surface of Mars.

name: Frontier Health
description: The adaptation of healthcare to outer space and otherworldly bodies.

unlock_details.description: Buildings: Frontier Clinic 1, Frontier Clinic 1 Earth, Frontier Clinic 1 Acamar, Frontier Clinic 1 Bajor, Frontier Clinic 1 Vulcan | Edicts: Ufp Union, Fc Union | Faction Types: Prosperity, Technologist, Ferengi Corporation, Corporation | Policys: policy_health_university, policy_eugenics_allowed

name: Sulfuric World Terraforming
description: The sulfuric skies of these wet worlds are hostile to all species that require oxygen to breath. However, species who spend their lives in the water have unique insight into how to manipulate underwater ecosystems to remove the toxins.

name: Theta Radiation Containment
description: The art of transporting the deadly byproduct of Theta Radiation is critical to ensuring the health of the Malon lifestyle.

name: Bio Field Co-ordination
description: Bio field coordination allows our vessels to synchronise quantum-level emissions, creating a unified front that amplifies the defensive attributes of their adaptive shields. Through intricate manipulation of bio fields, we elevate our survival capabilities, weaving a resilient protective web across our fleet.

name: Xindi Special Forces
description: Trained and led by the Reptilians this elite crew of Xindi warriors are prepared to give their lives for the Council.
